trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth and what is between them and what is under the soil.
trans-unit.target: Aan Hom behoort wat in die hemele en wat op die aarde is en wat tussen hulle en wat is onder die grond.

trans-unit.source: And if you speak aloud - then indeed, He knows the secret and what is [even] more hidden.
trans-unit.target: En as jy hardop praat - dan inderdaad, Hy weet die geheim en wat is [selfs] meer versteek.

trans-unit.source: Allah - there is no deity except Him. To Him belong the best names.
trans-unit.target: Allah - daar is geen god behalwe hom.

trans-unit.source: And has the story of Moses reached you? -
trans-unit.target: En het die verhaal van Moses julle bereik?

trans-unit.source: When he saw a fire and said to his family, "Stay here; indeed, I have perceived a fire; perhaps I can bring you a torch or find at the fire some guidance."
trans-unit.target: Toe hy 'n vuur het en het aan sy familie, "Bly hier, ja, het ek geweet 'n vuur, miskien kan ek jou 'n fakkel te bring of te vind op die vuur 'n bietjie leiding."

trans-unit.source: And when he came to it, he was called, "O Moses,
trans-unit.target: En toe Hy daarby kom, is hy, "O Moses,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am your Lord, so remove your sandals. Indeed, you are in the sacred valley of Tuwa.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, Ek is jou Here, so verwyder jou skoene.

trans-unit.source: And I have chosen you, so listen to what is revealed [to you].
trans-unit.target: En Ek het julle uitverkies, so luister na wat geopenbaar [om jou].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, I am Allah. There is no deity except Me, so worship Me and establish prayer for My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ek Allah.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - I almost conceal it - so that every soul may be recompensed according to that for which it strives.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, die uur kom - ek verberg dit amper - sodat elke siel vergeld kan volgens dit waarvoor dit streef.

trans-unit.source: So do not let one avert you from it who does not believe in it and follows his desire, for you [then] would perish.
trans-unit.target: So moenie toelaat dat een wat jy voorkom daaruit wat nie glo in dit en volg sy begeerte, vir jou [dan] sal vergaan.

trans-unit.source: And what is that in your right hand, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: En wat is dit in jou regterhand, o Moses? "

trans-unit.source: He said, "It is my staff; I lean upon it, and I bring down leaves for my sheep and I have therein other uses."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Dit is my personeel, ek leun daarop, en ek afbring blare vir my skape en ek het ander gebruike in gooi."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Throw it down, O Moses."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sê: "Gooi dit neer, o Moses."

trans-unit.source: So he threw it down, and thereupon it was a snake, moving swiftly.
trans-unit.target: So gooi hy dit af, en daarna was dit 'n slang, beweeg vinnig.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Seize it and fear not; We will return it to its former condition.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "Gryp dit en vrees nie; Ons sal dit terugkeer na sy vorige toestand.

trans-unit.source: And draw in your hand to your side; it will come out white without disease - another sign,
trans-unit.target: En trek in jou hand om jou kant;

trans-unit.source: That We may show you [some] of Our greater signs.
trans-unit.target: Sodat ons kan jou wys [sommige] van ons groter tekens.

trans-unit.source: Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed."
trans-unit.target: Gaan na Farao.

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "My Lord, expand for me my breast [with assurance]
trans-unit.target: [Moses] het gesê: "My Here, uit te brei vir my my bors [met sekerheid]

trans-unit.source: And ease for me my task
trans-unit.target: En gemak vir my my taak

trans-unit.source: And untie the knot from my tongue
trans-unit.target: En los te maak die knoop van my tong

trans-unit.source: That they may understand my speech.
trans-unit.target: Sodat hulle my toespraak kan verstaan.

trans-unit.source: And appoint for me a minister from my family -
trans-unit.target: En stel vir my 'n predikant van my familie -

trans-unit.source: Aaron, my brother.
trans-unit.target: Aaron, my broer.

trans-unit.source: Increase through him my strength
trans-unit.target: Verhoog deur hom my krag

trans-unit.source: And let him share my task
trans-unit.target: En laat hom my werk te deel

trans-unit.source: That we may exalt You much
trans-unit.target: Dat ons kan verhoog jou baie

trans-unit.source: And remember You much.
trans-unit.target: En onthou julle baie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, You are of us ever Seeing."
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, U is ons ooit gesien het. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "You have been granted your request, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "Jy is jou versoek, o Moses toegestaan.

trans-unit.source: And We had already conferred favor upon you another time,
trans-unit.target: En ons het reeds verleen guns oor julle 'n ander tyd,

trans-unit.source: When We inspired to your mother what We inspired,
trans-unit.target: Wanneer ons geïnspireer om jou ma wat ons geïnspireer,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], 'Cast him into the chest and cast it into the river, and the river will throw it onto the bank; there will take him an enemy to Me and an enemy to him.' And I bestowed upon you love from Me that you would be brought up under My eye.
trans-unit.target: [Sê], 'werp hom in die bors geskiet en dit gegooi in die rivier, en die rivier sal dit gooi op die bank;

trans-unit.source: [And We favored you] when your sister went and said, 'Shall I direct you to someone who will be responsible for him?' So We restored you to your mother that she might be content and not grieve. And you killed someone, but We saved you from retaliation and tried you with a [severe] trial. And you remained [some] years among the people of Madyan. Then you came [here] at the decreed time, O Moses.
trans-unit.target: [En Ons bevoordeel jy] wanneer jou suster het en het gesê: "Sal ek jou na iemand wat verantwoordelik is vir hom sal wees?"

trans-unit.source: And I produced you for Myself.
trans-unit.target: En ek geproduseer jy vir My.

trans-unit.source: Go, you and your brother, with My signs and do not slacken in My remembrance.
trans-unit.target: Gaan jy en jou broer, met my tekens en moenie verslap in My gedagtenis.

trans-unit.source: Go, both of you, to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: Gaan julle altwee, vir Farao.

trans-unit.source: And speak to him with gentle speech that perhaps he may be reminded or fear [Allah]."
trans-unit.target: En spreek met hom met sagte toespraak wat dalk kan hy herinner word of vrees [Allah]. "

trans-unit.source: They said, "Our Lord, indeed we are afraid that he will hasten [punishment] against us or that he will transgress."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ons Here, inderdaad ons is bang dat hy [straf] sal gou teen ons, of dat hy 'n oortreding begaan."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Fear not. Indeed, I am with you both; I hear and I see.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "Moenie bang wees nie Inderdaad, Ek is met julle albei;. Ek hoor en ek sien.

trans-unit.source: So go to him and say, 'Indeed, we are messengers of your Lord, so send with us the Children of Israel and do not torment them. We have come to you with a sign from your Lord. And peace will be upon he who follows the guidance.
trans-unit.target: So gaan na hom toe en sê: "Ons is inderdaad boodskappers van jou Here, so saam met ons stuur die kinders van Israel en moet hulle nie te pynig nie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it has been revealed to us that the punishment will be upon whoever denies and turns away.' "
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, is dit aan ons geopenbaar dat die straf sal wees op wie ontken en draai weg. "

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "So who is the Lord of you two, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Farao] het gesê: "So wie is die Here van julle twee, o Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Our Lord is He who gave each thing its form and then guided [it]."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Ons Here is Hy wat sy vorm gegee elke ding en dan gelei [dit]."

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "Then what is the case of the former generations?"
trans-unit.target: [Farao] sê: "Dan wat is die geval van die vorige geslagte?"

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "The knowledge thereof is with my Lord in a record. My Lord neither errs nor forgets."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] het gesê: "Die kennis daarvan is met my Here in 'n rekord. My Here nie errs nie vergeet."

trans-unit.source: [It is He] who has made for you the earth as a bed [spread out] and inserted therein for you roadways and sent down from the sky, rain and produced thereby categories of various plants.
trans-unit.target: [Dit is Hy] wat vir jou die aarde as 'n bed [versprei] en plaas daarin vir jou paaie en gestuur uit die hemel neergedaal, reën en sodoende geproduseer kategorieë van verskeie plante.

trans-unit.source: Eat [therefrom] and pasture your livestock. Indeed, in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Eet [daaruit] en weiding jou vee.

trans-unit.source: From the earth We created you, and into it We will return you, and from it We will extract you another time.
trans-unit.target: Van die aarde Ons het jou en daarin Ons sal jy terugkeer, en daaruit sal ons jou onttrek n ander tyd.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly showed Pharaoh Our signs - all of them - but he denied and refused.
trans-unit.target: En ons het beslis Farao Ons tekens - almal van hulle - maar hy het dit ontken en geweier.

trans-unit.source: He said, "Have you come to us to drive us out of our land with your magic, O Moses?
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Het jy gekom om ons aan ons ry uit ons land met jou magie, o Moses?

trans-unit.source: Then we will surely bring you magic like it, so make between us and you an appointment, which we will not fail to keep and neither will you, in a place assigned."
trans-unit.target: Dan sal ons sekerlik bring jy magie soos dit, so maak tussen ons en julle 'n afspraak, wat ons nie sal faal om te hou en nie sal jy op 'n plek wat. "

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Your appointment is on the day of the festival when the people assemble at mid-morning."
trans-unit.target: [Moses] het gesê: "Jou afspraak is op die dag van die fees wanneer die mense bymekaar te mid-oggend."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh went away, put together his plan, and then came [to Moses].
trans-unit.target: So het Farao weg, saam te stel sy plan, en dan kom [Moses].

trans-unit.source: Moses said to the magicians summoned by Pharaoh, "Woe to you! Do not invent a lie against Allah or He will exterminate you with a punishment; and he has failed who invents [such falsehood]."
trans-unit.target: Moses het vir die geleerdes gedagvaar deur Farao, "Wee jy doen 'n leuen teen Allah nie uitvind of Hy sal jou uit te wis met 'n straf;!. En hy in gebreke gebly het wat bedink [so 'n leuen]"

trans-unit.source: So they disputed over their affair among themselves and concealed their private conversation.
trans-unit.target: Sodat hulle betwis oor hul verhouding met mekaar en bedek hul private gesprek.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Indeed, these are two magicians who want to drive you out of your land with their magic and do away with your most exemplary way.
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ja, dit is twee geleerdes wat wil jy ry uit jou land met hul magie en weg te doen met jou mees voorbeeldige wyse.

trans-unit.source: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
trans-unit.target: So los op jou plan en dan kom [Vorentoe] in lyn.

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "O Moses, óf jy gooi of sal ons die eerste wees om te gooi."

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Nee, jy gooi."

trans-unit.source: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
trans-unit.target: En hy voel homself vrees, het Moses.

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
trans-unit.target: Allah het gesê: "Moenie bang wees nie. Inteendeel, dit is julle wat beter.

trans-unit.source: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
trans-unit.target: En gooi dit wat in jou regterhand;

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
trans-unit.target: So het die geleerdes neergeval in uitputting.

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: [Farao] het gesê: "Jy hom geglo voordat ek jou toestemming gegee. Inderdaad, hy is jou leier wat jy magie geleer. So sal Ek sekerlik uitgeroei jou hande en jou voete aan teenoorgestelde kante, en Ek sal julle gekruisig op die stamme

trans-unit.source: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Nooit sal ons verkies jy oor wat ons het gekom van duidelike tekens en [meer] Hy wat ons geskep het. So besluit watter jy moet besluit. Jy kan net besluit om hierdie aardse lewe.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons het geglo in die Here dat Hy ons kan vergewe ons sondes en wat jy ons verplig [te doen] van magie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, wie kom by sy Here as 'n kriminele - inderdaad, vir hom is die hel;

trans-unit.source: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
trans-unit.target: Maar wie kom by hom as 'n gelowige goeie werke gedoen het - vir diegene sal wees om die hoogste grade [in posisie]:

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
trans-unit.target: Gardens van ewige woning waardeur riviere strome, waarin hulle vir ewig bly.

trans-unit.source: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
trans-unit.target: En ons het geïnspireer om Moses gesê: "Reis deur die nag met my dienaars en staking vir hulle 'n droë pad deur die see, sal jy nie vrees ingehaal [deur Farao] of verskrik wees nie [van verdrinking]."

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
trans-unit.target: Daarop laat Farao hulle agtervolg met sy soldate, en daar het hulle oordek uit die see wat hulle bedek,

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
trans-unit.target: En Farao het sy volk verlei en het nie te lei [hulle].

trans-unit.source: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
trans-unit.target: O kinders van Israel, Ons het julle uit jou vyand, en ons het 'n afspraak met jou op die regte kant van die gebergte afgetrek, en ons het tot by U manna en kwartels,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
trans-unit.target: [Sê], "Eet van die goeie dinge waarmee ons u het voorsien en nie oortree [of onderdruk ander] daarin, sodat my toorn oor julle moet daal. En hy oor wie my woede daal het beslis gedaal."

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
trans-unit.target: Maar ja, ek is die deurlopende Vergewer van wie berou het en glo en doen geregtigheid en dan voort in leiding.

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sê: "En wat het julle gou uit jou volk, o Moses?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Hulle is naby aan my spore, en ek het hom gehaas om U, my Here, dat U 'n welbehae."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "Maar so het ons jou mense probeer nadat jy [vertrek], en die Saamiri het hulle mislei."

trans-unit.source: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
trans-unit.target: En Moses het na sy mense, kwaad en 'n bedroefde.

trans-unit.source: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ons het nie ons belofte breek vir jou deur ons wil, maar ons is gemaak om laste te dra van die ornamente van die mense [van Farao], sodat ons gooi hulle [in die vuur], en so het die Saamiri gooi

trans-unit.source: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
trans-unit.target: En hy onttrek vir hulle [die standbeeld van] 'n kalf wat 'n gebulk klank gehad, en hulle het gesê: "Dit is jou God en die God van Moses, maar hy het vergeet."

trans-unit.source: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
trans-unit.target: Het hulle nie sien dat dit nie kon terugkeer na hulle enige spraak en dat dit nie in besit neem vir hulle enige skade of voordeel?

trans-unit.source: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
trans-unit.target: En Aäron het reeds gesê hulle voor [die terugkeer van Moses], "O my volk, jy net getoets deur dit, en wel, jou God is die Genadigste, sodat My volg en te gehoorsaam my bestelling."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ons sal nooit ophou om gewy aan die kalf tot op Moses terug na ons."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
trans-unit.target: [Moses] het gesê: "O Aäron, wat jy verhoed, wanneer jy hulle sien teëkom wat ronddwaal,

trans-unit.source: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
trans-unit.target: Agter my?

trans-unit.source: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
trans-unit.target: [Aaron] het gesê: "O seun van my ma, moenie gryp [my] deur my baard of deur my kop. Inderdaad, ek het gevrees dat jy sou sê:" Jy veroorsaak verdeeldheid onder die kinders van Israel, en julle het nie ag te neem

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
trans-unit.target: [Moses] sê: "En wat is jou saak, o Saamiri?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Ek het gesien wat hulle nie gesien het nie, so ek het 'n handjievol [stof] van die baan van die boodskapper en gooi dit, en dus het my siel te verlei my."

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
trans-unit.target: [Moses] het gesê: "Gaan dan. En inderdaad, dit is [VERKLAAR] vir jou in [die] lewe te sê," Nee kontak. "

trans-unit.source: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: Jou God is slegs Allah, behalwe vir wie daar geen god.

trans-unit.source: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: So, [O Muhammad], Ons hou verband met jou uit die nuus van wat voorafgegaan.

trans-unit.source: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
trans-unit.target: Wie draai weg van dit - dan inderdaad, sal hy dra op die dag van die opstanding tot 'n las,

trans-unit.source: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
trans-unit.target: [Abiding] ewig daarin, en die bose is dit vir hulle op die dag van die opstanding as 'n las -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
trans-unit.target: Die Dag van die Horn sal geblaas word.

trans-unit.source: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal murmureer onder mekaar gesê: "Jy bly nie, maar tien [dae in die wêreld]."

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
trans-unit.target: Ons is die meeste omdat jy weet van wat hulle sê wanneer die beste van hulle op 'n wyse sal sê: "Jy bly nie, maar een dag."

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
trans-unit.target: En hulle vra jou oor die berge, so te sê, "My Here sal hulle blaas weg met 'n ontploffing.

trans-unit.source: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
trans-unit.target: En Hy sal die aarde laat 'n vlak vlakte;

trans-unit.source: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
trans-unit.target: Jy sal nie daarin sien 'n depressie of 'n opstand. "

trans-unit.source: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
trans-unit.target: Daardie dag sal almal [die oproep van] volg die Caller [met] geen afwyking daarvan, en [al] stemme sal tot bedaring gebring voor die Genadigste, sodat jy nie hoor behalwe 'n fluisterstem [van voetstappe].

trans-unit.source: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
trans-unit.target: Dié dag sal geen voorbidding baat behalwe [dié van] een aan wie die Genadigste het toestemming gegee en het sy woord aanvaar.

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: Allah weet wat is [tans] voor hulle en wat sal wees na hulle, maar hulle doen dit nie sluit in kennis.

trans-unit.source: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
trans-unit.target: En [al] gesigte, sal verneder word voor die lewende, die Onderhouer van die bestaan.

trans-unit.source: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
trans-unit.target: Maar hy wat van goeie werke, terwyl hy 'n gelowige - hy sal nie vrees onreg of ontneming.

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
trans-unit.target: En so het ons dit af as 'n Arabiese Koran gestuur en het daarin die waarskuwings dat dit dalk sal hulle [die sonde] te vermy of dit sou hulle gedagtenis veroorsaak gediversifiseer.

trans-unit.source: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: So 'n hoë [bowenal] is Allah, die Here, die Waarheid.

trans-unit.source: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
trans-unit.target: En ons het reeds 'n belofte van Adam geneem voordat, maar hy het vergeet;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Toe Ons aan die engele gesê: "Werp aan Adam," en hulle neergebuig, behalwe Iblees;

trans-unit.source: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
trans-unit.target: Daarom het ons gedink: "O Adam, inderdaad dit is 'n vyand vir jou en jou vrou. Moet hy jou nie uit die Paradys verwyder sodat jy sal ly nie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, is dit [belowe] vir jou nie te honger daarin wees of nie ontklee.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, jy sal nie dors daarin wees of sy warmste van die son. "

trans-unit.source: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
trans-unit.target: Dan fluister Satan hom;

trans-unit.source: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
trans-unit.target: En die mens en sy vrou het geëet van dit, en hul private dele duidelik geword vir hulle, en hulle het begin om vas oor hulself uit die blare van die Paradys.

trans-unit.source: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
trans-unit.target: Toe het verkies om hom Here hom en draai na hom in vergifnis en begeleide [hom].

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "af van die Paradys -. Al, [jou nageslag] om vyande aan mekaar en as daar moet na jou toe kom leiding van My - dan elkeen volg My leiding sal nie dwaal [in die wêreld] of ly [

trans-unit.source: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
trans-unit.target: En elkeen wat afwyk van My gedagtenis - inderdaad, hy sal 'n depressiewe lewe, en Ons sal hom vergader op die dag van die opstanding blind ".

trans-unit.source: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
trans-unit.target: Hy sal sê: "My Here, waarom het U opgewek my blind terwyl ek besig was [keer] sien?"

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sal sê: "So het Ons tekens na jou toe kom, en jy hulle vergeet;. En dus sal jy dit Dag vergeet"

trans-unit.source: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: En so sit ons laat neerkom wie oortree en nie glo in die tekens van sy Here.

trans-unit.source: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: Dan, het dit nie vir hulle duidelik geword hoeveel geslagte Ons vernietig voor hulle as hulle in jul midde wandel hul wonings?

trans-unit.source: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
trans-unit.target: En as dit nie vir 'n woord wat voorafgegaan van jou God, straf sou 'n verpligting [as gevolg onmiddellik], en [as dit nie vir] 'n bepaalde termyn [VERKLAAR].

trans-unit.source: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: So wees geduldig oor wat hulle sê en verhef [Allah] met lof van jou Here voor die opgang van die son en voor die instelling;

trans-unit.source: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: En moenie jou oë uit te brei na dit waarmee ons genot gegee om [ 'n] kategorieë van hulle, [sy wese maar] die prag van wêreldse lewe, waardeur ons toets hulle.

trans-unit.source: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
trans-unit.target: En beveel gebed op jou familie [en mense] en daarin standvastig.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
trans-unit.target: En hulle sê: "Waarom het Hy ons nie bring 'n teken van die Here?"

trans-unit.source: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
trans-unit.target: En as ons dit met 'n straf voor hom verdelg het, sou hulle sê: "Ons Here, waarom het U nie stuur vir ons 'n boodskapper so kan ons jou verse gevolg het voordat ons verneder en skande?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "Elke [ons] wag, so wag vir jou sal weet wie is die bewoners van die klank pad en wat gelei.."

trans-unit.source: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
trans-unit.target: [Die tyd van] hul rekening genader vir die mense, terwyl hulle in heedlessness weg te draai.

trans-unit.source: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
trans-unit.target: Geen melding kom om hulle opnuut van die Here, behalwe dat hulle luister na dit terwyl hulle op die spel

trans-unit.source: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
trans-unit.target: Met hul harte afgelei.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: Die profeet het gesê: "My Here weet alles wat gesê dwarsdeur die hemel en die aarde, en Hy is die verhoor, die Alwetende."

trans-unit.source: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle sê: "[Die openbaring is maar] 'n mengsel van nietige drome, maar eerder, het hy dit uitgevind nie, maar eerder, hy is 'n digter Laat hom bring vir ons 'n teken net soos die vorige [boodskappers] gestuur [met wonderwerke.

trans-unit.source: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
trans-unit.target: Nie 'n [enkele] vesting wat ons vernietig het geglo voordat hulle so sal hulle glo?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie voor julle [O Muhammad], behalwe die mense aan wie ons geopenbaar [die boodskap], so vra die mense van die boodskap as jy nie weet nie.

trans-unit.source: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie die profete vorms nie eet van voedsel te maak nie, was hulle onsterflike [op aarde].

trans-unit.source: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: Toe Ons vervul vir hulle die belofte, en Ons het hulle verlos en wie Ons wou en vernietig die oortreders.

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: Ons het beslis 'n boek gestuur om julle in wat jou vermelding.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
trans-unit.target: En hoeveel 'n stad wat onregverdige was het ons gebreek en vervaardig nadat dit 'n ander volk.

trans-unit.source: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
trans-unit.target: En toe sy inwoners beskou Ons straf, in 'n keer het hulle gevlug daaruit.

trans-unit.source: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
trans-unit.target: [Sommige engele gesê], "Moenie vlug, maar terugkeer na die plek waar jy is gegee luukse en om jou huis -. Miskien het jy sal ondervra"

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "O wee ons! Inderdaad, ons was oortreders."

trans-unit.source: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
trans-unit.target: En daardie verklaring wat aan hulle behoort het nie ophou totdat ons het hulle [as] 'n oes [afgemaai], geblus [soos 'n vuur].

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie die hemel en die aarde en wat skep tussen hulle in die spel.

trans-unit.source: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
trans-unit.target: Moes ons bedoel is om 'n afleiding te neem, kan ons dit uit [wat] met ons - as [inderdaad] Ons was om dit te doen.

trans-unit.source: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
trans-unit.target: Inteendeel, ons stamp nie die waarheid op 'n leuen, en dit vernietig dit, en daarna is dit weer vertrek.

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
trans-unit.target: Aan Hom behoort elkeen wat in die hemel en die aarde.

trans-unit.source: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
trans-unit.target: Hulle verhef [hom] nag en dag [en] nie verslap.

trans-unit.source: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
trans-unit.target: Of het die mense geneem vir hulself gode van die aarde wat op te wek [die dooies]?

trans-unit.source: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Het daar binne die hemele en die aarde gode naas Allah, sou hulle albei het verwoes.

trans-unit.source: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: Hy is nie gevra oor wat Hy doen, maar hulle sal bevraagteken.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
trans-unit.target: Of het hulle geneem gode naas Hom?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie voordat jy enige boodskapper behalwe dat ons aan hom geopenbaar nie, "Daar is geen god behalwe My, sodat my aanbid."

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
trans-unit.target: En hulle sê: "Die meeste Barmhartige het 'n seun geneem."

trans-unit.source: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
trans-unit.target: Hulle kan hom nie vooraf in woord, en hulle tree deur sy gebod.

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Hy weet wat is [tans] voor hulle en wat sal wees nadat hulle, en hulle kan nie intree behalwe namens een wie Hy dit goedkeur.

trans-unit.source: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: En elkeen van hulle moet sê, "Ja, ek is 'n God buiten Hom" - dat 'n mens Ons wil vergeld met die hel.

trans-unit.source: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
trans-unit.target: Het diegene wat nie geglo mening dat die hemel en die aarde is 'n aangesluit entiteit, en Ons geskei hulle en gemaak van water al die diere?

trans-unit.source: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
trans-unit.target: En ons geplaas binne die aarde stewig berge, sodat dit moet skuif met hulle, en Ons het daarin [berg] verby [as] paaie sodat hulle iets kon gelei.

trans-unit.source: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: En ons het die hemelruim 'n beskermde plafon, maar hulle, uit sy tekens, is weg draai.

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
trans-unit.target: En dit is Hy wat kom in die nag en die dag en die son en die maan geskep;

trans-unit.source: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie aan enige man voor jy die ewigheid [op aarde];

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Elke siel sal sterwe.

trans-unit.source: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: En toe die wat nie glo wat jy sien, [O Muhammad], hulle jou nie, behalwe in bespotting, [sê] "Is dit die een wat jou gode beledig?"

trans-unit.source: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: Die mens is geskape van haas.

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: En hulle sê: "Wanneer is hierdie belofte, as jy die waarheid praat moet wees?"

trans-unit.source: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
trans-unit.target: As diegene wat geglo, maar het geweet dat die tyd wanneer hulle die vuur nie sal voorkom uit hul gesigte of van hulle rug en hulle sal nie gehelp ...

trans-unit.source: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: Inteendeel, dit sal vir hulle onverwags kom en betower, en hulle sal nie in staat wees om dit af te weer nie, en hulle sal begenadig.

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: En al was boodskappers gespot voor jou, maar diegene wat hulle bespot is omring deur wat hulle gebruik om bespotting.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Wie kan jou beskerm in die nag of dag van die Genadigste?"

trans-unit.source: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
trans-unit.target: Of het hulle gode aan om hulle anders as ons te verdedig?

trans-unit.source: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
trans-unit.target: Maar, [inteendeel] Ons het goeie dinge waarvoor hierdie [ongelowiges] en hulle vaders tot lewe verleng vir hulle.

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
trans-unit.target: Sê, "Ek het net waarsku julle deur 'n openbaring."

trans-unit.source: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: En as [soveel as] 'n reuk van die straf van jou Here hulle kon aanraak, sou hulle sekerlik sê, "O wee ons! Inderdaad, ons het oortreders was."

trans-unit.source: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
trans-unit.target: En Ons plaas die skale van geregtigheid vir die dag van die opstanding, sodat daar geen siel sal onregverdig glad behandel.

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
trans-unit.target: En ons het reeds die maatstaf en 'n lig en 'n herinnering vir die regverdige gegee het Moses en Aäron

trans-unit.source: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: Wie vrees die Here onsigbare, terwyl hulle van die Uur bekommerd.

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
trans-unit.target: En dit [Koran] is 'n geseënde boodskap wat ons laat weet het.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
trans-unit.target: En ons het beslis sy goeie oordeel gegee Abraham voor, en ons was van hom goed Weet

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
trans-unit.target: Toe hy sê vir sy vader en sy mense, "Wat is hierdie beelde waaraan jy gewy?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ons het gevind dat ons vaders aanbidders van hulle."

trans-unit.source: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Jy was beslis, julle en julle vaders in openbare dwaling."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Het jy al vir ons kom met die waarheid, of is jy van diegene wat grap?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "[Geen], eerder, jou God is die Here van die hemel en die aarde wat hulle geskep het, en ek, om dit, am van diegene wat getuig.

trans-unit.source: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
trans-unit.target: En [ek sweer] deur Allah, sal ek sekerlik beplan teen julle drekgode nadat jy draai en trek weg. "

trans-unit.source: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
trans-unit.target: So het hy hulle in fragmente, behalwe 'n groot een onder hulle, dat hulle kan terugkeer na dit [en vraag].

trans-unit.source: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Wie het dit gedoen om ons gode? Inderdaad, hy is van die oortreders."

trans-unit.source: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Ons het 'n jong man hulle wat Abraham genoem te noem."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Vat hom as voor die oë van die volk, dat hulle dringend te waarsku."

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Het jy dit aan ons gode, o Abraham gedoen?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Nee, hierdie - die grootste van hulle - dit gedoen het, so vra hulle, as hulle moet [in staat wees om] praat."

trans-unit.source: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: So het hulle teruggegaan na [blameer] hulself en gesê [mekaar], "Inderdaad, jy is die oortreders."

trans-unit.source: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
trans-unit.target: Dan omgekeer hulle, [sê] "Julle het reeds bekend dat hierdie praat nie!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê, "Dan het jy aanbid in plaas van Allah wat julle nie baat glad of benadeel jy?

trans-unit.source: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
trans-unit.target: UFF aan jou en wat jy aanbid in plaas van Allah.

trans-unit.source: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
trans-unit.target: Hulle het gesê: "Brand hom en ondersteun jou gode -. As jy om op te tree"

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: Allah het gesê: "O vuur wees koelte en veiligheid oor Abraham."

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: En hulle bedoel is vir hom kwaad, maar ons het hulle die grootste verloorders.

trans-unit.source: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: En Ons het hom en Lot na die land wat ons vir die wêreld geseën.

trans-unit.source: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
trans-unit.target: En ons het hom Isak en Jakob benewens, en al [van hulle] Ons het regverdig.

trans-unit.source: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
trans-unit.target: En ons het hulle leiers lei deur Ons gebod.

trans-unit.source: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: En vir Lot Ons het insig en kennis, en ons red hom uit die stad wat die pleeg van bose dade.

trans-unit.source: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: En Ons erken Hom in ons genade.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Noag, toe hy geroep [Allah] voor [daardie tyd], sodat ons gereageer het op hom en hom en sy familie van die groot vloed gered.

trans-unit.source: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
trans-unit.target: En ons red hom van die mense wat ons tekens ontken.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Dawid en Salomo, wanneer hulle geoordeel met betrekking tot die veld - wanneer die skape van die volk oorrompel dit [snags], en ons was getuie van hul oordeel.

trans-unit.source: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
trans-unit.target: En ons het begrip van die saak aan Salomo en aan elke [van hulle] Ons het vonnis en kennis.

trans-unit.source: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
trans-unit.target: En Ons het hom geleer die modellering van rokke van wapens om jou te beskerm teen jou [vyand in] stryd.

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: En aan Salomo [Ons onderwerp] die wind, waai kragtig, wat uitstroom deur sy bevel na die land wat ons geseën het.

trans-unit.source: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
trans-unit.target: En van die duiwels uitgevaar het, diegene wat geduik vir hom en het behalwe dat die werk.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Job verander toe hy geroep is om sy Here, "Inderdaad, teenspoed het My aangeraak, en jy is die Genadigste van die barmhartige."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: So Ons gereageer op hom en verwyder wat hom geteister van teenspoed.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Ismael en Idrees en page-Kifl;

trans-unit.source: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: En Ons erken hulle in ons genade.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: En [melding] die man van die vis toe hy afgegaan het in woede en het gedink dat ons sou nie besluit [iets] op hom.

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
trans-unit.target: So Ons gereageer op hom en hom verlos uit die nood.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
trans-unit.target: En [melding] Sagaría, toe hy geroep is om sy Here: "My Here, moenie my uitlos [met geen erfgenaam], terwyl jy die beste van erfgename is."

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
trans-unit.target: So Ons gereageer op hom, en ons het vir hom Johannes en gewysig vir hom, sy vrou.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: En [melding] die een wat haar kuisheid bewaar, sodat ons blaas in haar [kleed] deur Ons engel [Gabriel], en Ons het haar en haar seun 'n teken vir die wêrelde.

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad hierdie, jou godsdiens, is een godsdiens, en Ek is jou Here, sodat my aanbid.

trans-unit.source: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
trans-unit.target: En [nog] hulle verdeel hul verhouding met mekaar, [maar] al vir Ons sal terugkeer.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
trans-unit.target: So elkeen wat dit doen goeie werke, terwyl hy 'n gelowige - geen ontkenning sal daar wees vir sy moeite, en inderdaad Ons, daarvan, is opnemers.

trans-unit.source: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
trans-unit.target: En daar is die verbod op [die mense van] 'n vesting wat ons vernietig het dat hulle sal [ooit] terugkeer

trans-unit.source: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
trans-unit.target: Tot wanneer [die dam van] die Gog en die Magog is geopen en hulle, uit al die opstand, daal

trans-unit.source: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: En [wanneer] die ware belofte genader;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, jy [ongelowiges] en wat jy buiten Allah aanbid is die vuurmaakhout van die hel.

trans-unit.source: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
trans-unit.target: Het hierdie [valse gode] was [werklike] gode, sou hulle nie om dit te kom, maar al is die ewige daarin.

trans-unit.source: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
trans-unit.target: Vir hulle daarin is swaar gesug, en hulle sal daarin nie hoor.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene vir wie die beste [beloning] het voorafgegaan van ons - hulle is van dit ver verwyder.

trans-unit.source: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal die klank nie hoor, terwyl hulle, in wat hulle siele verlang, as iets blywends in ewigheid.

trans-unit.source: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal nie bedroef deur die grootste skrik, en die engele sal hulle tegemoet [sê]: "Dit is jou dag wat jy het belowe" -

trans-unit.source: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
trans-unit.target: Die dag wanneer ons sal die hemel vou soos die vou van 'n [skriftelik] blad vir die rekords.

trans-unit.source: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
trans-unit.target: En Ons het reeds in die boek [Psalms] geskryf na die [vorige] noem dat die land [van Paradise] geërf deur My regverdige dienaars.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, in hierdie [Koran] is kennisgewing vir 'n aanbidding mense.

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: En ons het julle [O Muhammad] nie gestuur nie, behalwe as 'n genade om die wêrelde.

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Dit is net aan my geopenbaar dat jou God is maar een God, so sal jy wees Moslems [in onderdanigheid aan Hom]?"

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: Maar as hulle afwend, dan sê, "Ek het na [al] jy ewe bekend gemaak word. En ek weet nie of naby of ver is dit wat jy belowe.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, Hy weet wat verklaar van spraak, en Hy weet wat jy verberg.

trans-unit.source: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: En ek weet nie;

trans-unit.source: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: [Die profeet] het gesê: "My Meester, regter [tussen ons] in waarheid. En ons Here is die Barmhartige, die een wie se hulp gesoek teen dit wat jy beskryf."

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
trans-unit.target: O mensdom, vrees jou Here.

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.
trans-unit.target: Op die dag wat jy dit sien elke verpleging ma sal afgelei word uit daardie [kind] sy verpleging, en elke swanger vrou sal haar swangerskap te aborteer, en jy sal sien die mense [verskyning] dronk terwyl hulle nie dronk;

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
trans-unit.target: En van die mense is wie geskille oor Allah sonder kennis en volg elke opstandige duiwel.

trans-unit.source: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: Dit is besluit om elke duiwel sodat elkeen draai na hom - hy sal hom mislei en sal hom lei tot die straf van die brand.

trans-unit.source: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.
trans-unit.target: O, mense, as jy moet wees in twyfel oor die opstanding, dan [mening dat] inderdaad, Ons het jou uit die stof, dan van 'n lewe kiem, dan van 'n vasklou stol, en dan van 'n knop van vleis, gevorm en ongevormde

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
trans-unit.target: Dit is omdat Allah die Waarheid is en omdat Hy gee lewe na die dood en omdat Hy oor alles bevoegde

trans-unit.source: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: En [dat hulle kan weet] dat die uur kom - geen twyfel daaroor nie - en dat Allah sal wek diegene in die grafte.

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
trans-unit.target: En van die mense is wie geskille oor Allah sonder kennis of leiding of 'n interessante boek [van Hom],

trans-unit.source: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],
trans-unit.target: Draai sy nek [in arrogansie] om te mislei [mense] uit die pad van Allah.

trans-unit.source: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: "Dit is vir dit wat jul hande uitbrei gesit en omdat Allah nooit onregverdig om [Sy] dienaars."

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.
trans-unit.target: En van die mense is wie Allah aanbid op 'n voorsprong.

trans-unit.source: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
trans-unit.target: Hy roep in plaas van Allah wat nie hom of voordele hom nadelig.

trans-unit.source: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.
trans-unit.target: Hy roep een wie se skade is nader as sy voordeel - hoe ellendig die beskermer en hoe ellendig die mede.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal Allah erken diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen om tuine waardeur riviere strome.

trans-unit.source: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?
trans-unit.target: Wie moet dink dat Allah nie sal ondersteun [profeet Mohammed] in hierdie wêreld en in die Hiernamaals - laat hom 'n tou uit te brei na die plafon, dan afgesny [sy asem], en laat hom sien: sal sy pogings te verwyder wat woedend [hom

trans-unit.source: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.
trans-unit.target: En so het ons gestuur die Qur'an af as verse van 'n duidelike bewys en omdat Allah lei wie Hy wil.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat geglo het en diegene wat Jode en die Sabeërs en die Christene en die Magians en diegene wat verband hou met Allah was - sal Allah oordeel tussen hulle op die dag van die opstanding.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: Sien jy nie dat Allah prostrates wie is in die hemel en elkeen wat op die aarde en die son, die maan, die sterre, die berge, die bome, die bewegende wesens en baie van die mense?

trans-unit.source: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water
trans-unit.target: Dit is twee teenstanders wat betwis oor hul Here.

trans-unit.source: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
trans-unit.target: Waardeur gesmelt wat binne hul mae en [hulle] velle.

trans-unit.source: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
trans-unit.target: En vir [treffende] hulle is staf van yster.

trans-unit.source: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"
trans-unit.target: Elke keer as hulle wil uit Hellfire van angs te kry, sal hulle teruggestuur word om dit, en [dit sal gesê word], "die straf van die brande!"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal Allah erken diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen om tuine waardeur riviere strome.

trans-unit.source: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: En hulle het gelei [in aardse lewe] om goeie rede, en hulle gelei word om die pad van die lofwaardige.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat nie geglo en voorkom [mense] uit die pad van Allah en [uit] Al-Masjid al-Haram, wat Ons het vir die mense - gelyk is die inwoner daarin en een van buite;

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate.
trans-unit.target: En [melding, O Muhammad], wanneer Ons aangewys vir Abraham die terrein van die Huis, [sê]: "Moenie assosieer enigiets met My en reinig my Huis vir diegene wat Tawaf presteer en diegene wat staan [in gebed] en diegene wat

trans-unit.source: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass -
trans-unit.target: En verkondig aan die volk die Hajj [pelgrimstog];

trans-unit.source: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.
trans-unit.target: Dat hulle voordele vir hulself kan getuig en noem die naam van Allah op bekend dae oor wat Hy vir hulle voorsien van [opofferende] diere.

trans-unit.source: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House."
trans-unit.target: Daarna moet hulle uiteindelik hul slordigheid en voldoen aan hul geloftes en uit te voer Tawaf rondom die antieke Huis. "

trans-unit.source: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement,
trans-unit.target: Dit [is beveel], en elkeen wat vereer die heilige verordeninge van Allah - dit is die beste vir hom in die oë van die Here.

trans-unit.source: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Toenemende [net] Allah, nie assosieer [iets] saam met Hom.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts.
trans-unit.target: Dit [is so].

trans-unit.source: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.
trans-unit.target: Vir jou was die diere te offer is voordele vir 'n bepaalde termyn;

trans-unit.source: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]
trans-unit.target: En vir alle godsdiens Ons het 'n ritueel [van opoffering] dat hulle die naam van Allah kan noem oor wat Hy vir hulle voorsien van [opofferende] diere aangestel.

trans-unit.source: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.
trans-unit.target: Wie, wanneer Allah genoem word, hulle harte is bang, en [te] die pasiënt oor wat hulle het benoud, en die establishers van gebed en diegene wat spandeer as wat ons hulle het voorsien.

trans-unit.source: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: En die kamele en die vee het ons vir jou as een van die simbole van Allah aangestel;

trans-unit.source: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Hul vleis sal nie bereik Allah nie sal hulle bloed onskuldig, maar wat hom bereik is vroomheid van jou.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, Allah verdedig diegene wat geglo het.

trans-unit.source: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.
trans-unit.target: Toestemming [veg] gegee aan diegene wat geveg, want hulle is verontreg.

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: [Hulle is] diegene wat uitgesit is uit hul huise met onreg - net omdat hulle sê: "Ons God is Allah."

trans-unit.source: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: [En hulle] diegene wat as ons gee hulle gesag in die land, vestig gebed en gee Zakah en beveel wat reg is en verbied wat verkeerd is.

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],
trans-unit.target: En as hulle jou verloën [O Muhammad] - so, voor hulle gedoen het die mense van Noag en 'Aad en Samoed verloën [hulle profete],

trans-unit.source: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
trans-unit.target: En die mense van Abraham en die volk van Lot

trans-unit.source: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: En die inwoners van Midian.

trans-unit.source: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.
trans-unit.target: En hoeveel 'n stad het Ons vernietig, terwyl dit verkeerd is verbind - so dit is [nou] gedaal tot niet - en [hoeveel] 'n goed vaar en [hoeveel] 'n hoë paleis.

trans-unit.source: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: So het hulle dan nie op die aarde en het harte waardeur redeneer en ore waarmee om te hoor?

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: En hulle moedig u aan om die straf te bespoedig.

trans-unit.source: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: En vir hoeveel 'n stad het ek verleng genot terwyl dit verkeerd is pleeg.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "O mense, ek is net om jou 'n duidelike Warner."

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: En diegene wat geglo het en gedoen regverdige dade - vir hulle is vergifnis en edel voorsiening.

trans-unit.source: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Maar die mense wat teen ons verse getwis, [soek] tot mislukking veroorsaak - dit is die metgeselle van Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie voor jou uit stuur 'n boodskapper of profeet behalwe dat toe hy praat [of opgesê], Satan gegooi in dit [ 'n misverstand].

trans-unit.source: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.
trans-unit.target: [Dit is] sodat Hy kan maak wat Satan gooi in 'n verhoor vir diegene in wie se harte is siekte en diegene hard van hart.

trans-unit.source: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: En so diegene wat kennis gegee kan weet dat dit die waarheid van jou God en [dus] glo in dit, en hulle harte nederig aan dit.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
trans-unit.target: Maar diegene wat nie glo sal nie ophou om te wees in twyfel daarvan tot die Uur kom oor hulle onverwags of daar by hulle kom die straf van 'n dorre Dag.

trans-unit.source: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [All] soewereiniteit Dié dag is vir Allah;

trans-unit.source: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: En hulle wat nie geglo en nie ontken Ons tekens - vir diegene daar sal 'n vernederende straf wees.

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: En diegene wat geëmigreer vir die saak van Allah en dan vermoor of gesterf - Allah sal sekerlik vir hulle 'n goeie voorsiening.

trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: Hy sal sekerlik veroorsaak dat hulle 'n ingang waarmee hulle tevrede sal wees betree, en inderdaad, Allah is Alwetend en Verdra.

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: Dit [is so].

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Dit is omdat Allah veroorsaak dat die nag na die dag en veroorsaak dat die dag na die nag betree en omdat Allah is hoor en sien.

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: Dit is omdat Allah die Waarheid, en wat hulle roep buiten Hom is 'n leuen, en omdat Allah is die Allerhoogste, die Grand.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Sien jy nie dat Allah stortreën uit die hemel het toe gestuur en die aarde word groen?
