trans-unit.source: And We left for him [favorable mention] among later generations:
trans-unit.target: En ons het vir hom [gunstige melding] onder latere geslagte:

trans-unit.source: "Peace upon Elias."
trans-unit.target: "Vrede op Elias."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We thus reward the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons dus beloon goeie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he was of Our believing servants.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, was hy van Ons glo dienaars.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Lot was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, Lot was een van die boodskappers.

trans-unit.source: [So mention] when We saved him and his family, all,
trans-unit.target: [So noem] Toe Ons hom en sy familie gered, al,

trans-unit.source: Except his wife among those who remained [with the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: Behalwe sy vrou onder diegene wat [met die kwaaddoeners] gebly.

trans-unit.source: Then We destroyed the others.
trans-unit.target: Toe Ons vernietig die ander.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you pass by them in the morning
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, jy verbygaan in die oggend

trans-unit.source: And at night. Then will you not use reason?
trans-unit.target: En in die nag.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, Jona was onder die boodskappers.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when he ran away to the laden ship.
trans-unit.target: [Noem] toe hy weggeloop na die gelaaide skip.

trans-unit.source: And he drew lots and was among the losers.
trans-unit.target: En hy het baie, was een van die verloorders.

trans-unit.source: Then the fish swallowed him, while he was blameworthy.
trans-unit.target: Dan sluk die vis hom terwyl hy self verwijt het.

trans-unit.source: And had he not been of those who exalt Allah,
trans-unit.target: En hy het nie van diegene wat Allah verhef nie,

trans-unit.source: He would have remained inside its belly until the Day they are resurrected.
trans-unit.target: Hy sou in sy maag bly staan het tot die dag wat hulle opgewek.

trans-unit.source: But We threw him onto the open shore while he was ill.
trans-unit.target: Maar ons het hom op die oop strand terwyl hy siek was.

trans-unit.source: And We caused to grow over him a gourd vine.
trans-unit.target: En ons het om te groei oor hom 'n wonderboom wingerdstok.

trans-unit.source: And We sent him to [his people of] a hundred thousand or more.
trans-unit.target: En Ons het hom na [sy volk van] 'n honderd duisend of meer.

trans-unit.source: And they believed, so We gave them enjoyment [of life] for a time.
trans-unit.target: En hulle het geglo, sodat ons het hulle genot [lewe] vir 'n tyd.

trans-unit.source: So inquire of them, [O Muhammad], "Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?
trans-unit.target: So raadpleeg hulle [O Muhammad], "Het jou Here het dogters terwyl hulle seuns het?

trans-unit.source: Or did We create the angels as females while they were witnesses?"
trans-unit.target: Of het ons te skep die engele as vroulike terwyl hulle getuies was? "

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, it is out of their [invented] falsehood that they say,
trans-unit.target: Ongetwyfeld, dit is uit hul [uitgevind] leuens wat hulle sê,

trans-unit.source: " Allah has begotten," and indeed, they are liars.
trans-unit.target: "Allah het verwek," en inderdaad, hulle is leuenaars.

trans-unit.source: Has He chosen daughters over sons?
trans-unit.target: Het Hy gekies dogters oor seuns?

trans-unit.source: What is [wrong] with you? How do you make judgement?
trans-unit.target: Wat is fout met jou?

trans-unit.source: Then will you not be reminded?
trans-unit.target: Dan sal jy nie daaraan herinner word?

trans-unit.source: Or do you have a clear authority?
trans-unit.target: Of het jy 'n duidelike gesag?

trans-unit.source: Then produce your scripture, if you should be truthful.
trans-unit.target: produseer dan jou Bybel, as jy die waarheid praat moet wees.

trans-unit.source: And they have claimed between Him and the jinn a lineage, but the jinn have already known that they [who made such claims] will be brought to [punishment].
trans-unit.target: En hulle het beweer tussen hom en die djinn n geslag, maar die djinn het reeds bekend dat hulle [wat sulke eise gemaak] om [straf] gebring sal word.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is Allah above what they describe,
trans-unit.target: Verhewe is Allah as wat hulle beskryf,

trans-unit.source: Except the chosen servants of Allah [who do not share in that sin].
trans-unit.target: Behalwe die gekose dienaars van Allah [wat nie deel in daardie sonde].

trans-unit.source: So indeed, you [disbelievers] and whatever you worship,
trans-unit.target: So ja, jy [ongelowiges] en alles wat jy aanbid,

trans-unit.source: You cannot tempt [anyone] away from Him
trans-unit.target: Jy kan nie versoek [iemand] weg van hom

trans-unit.source: Except he who is to [enter and] burn in the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe Hy wat aan [betree en] brand in die Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: [The angels say], "There is not among us any except that he has a known position.
trans-unit.target: [Die engele sê], "Daar is onder ons niemand behalwe dat hy 'n bekende posisie.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who line up [for prayer].
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, ons is diegene wat in lyn [vir gebed].

trans-unit.source: And indeed, we are those who exalt Allah."
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, ons is diegene wat Allah verhef. "

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the disbelievers used to say,
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, die ongelowiges gebruik om te sê,

trans-unit.source: "If we had a message from [those of] the former peoples,
trans-unit.target: "As ons 'n boodskap van [dié van] die voormalige volke,

trans-unit.source: We would have been the chosen servants of Allah."
trans-unit.target: Ons wil die gekose dienaars van Allah gewees het. "

trans-unit.source: But they disbelieved in it, so they are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle het nie geglo in dit, so hulle gaan om te weet.

trans-unit.source: And Our word has already preceded for Our servants, the messengers,
trans-unit.target: En ons woord het reeds voorafgegaan vir ons dienaars die boodskappers,

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, they would be those given victory
trans-unit.target: [Dit] inderdaad, hulle sal diegene gegee oorwinning wees

trans-unit.source: And [that] indeed, Our soldiers will be those who overcome.
trans-unit.target: En [dat] inderdaad, sal ons soldate wees diegene wat oorwin.

trans-unit.source: So, [O Muhammad], leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: So, [O Muhammad], laat hulle vir 'n tyd.

trans-unit.source: And see [what will befall] them, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: En sien [wat sal oorkom] hulle, want hulle gaan om te sien.

trans-unit.source: Then for Our punishment are they impatient?
trans-unit.target: Dan vir ons straf is hulle ongeduldig?

trans-unit.source: But when it descends in their territory, then evil is the morning of those who were warned.
trans-unit.target: Maar wanneer dit daal in hul grondgebied, en onheil is die oggend van diegene wat gewaarsku.

trans-unit.source: And leave them for a time.
trans-unit.target: En laat hulle vir 'n tyd.

trans-unit.source: And see, for they are going to see.
trans-unit.target: En sien, want hulle gaan om te sien.

trans-unit.source: Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: Verhewe is jou Here, die HERE van die heldedade as wat hulle beskryf.

trans-unit.source: And peace upon the messengers.
trans-unit.target: Vrede oor die boodskappers.

trans-unit.source: And praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: En lof aan Allah, die Here van die wêrelde.

trans-unit.source: Sad. By the Qur'an containing reminder...
trans-unit.target: Hartseer.

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve are in pride and dissension.
trans-unit.target: Maar diegene wat nie glo in trots en verdeeldheid.

trans-unit.source: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, and they [then] called out; but it was not a time for escape.
trans-unit.target: Hoeveel geslagte het Ons vernietig voor hulle, en hulle [dan] uitgeroep;

trans-unit.source: And they wonder that there has come to them a warner from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, "This is a magician and a liar.
trans-unit.target: En hulle wonder dat daar uit eie geledere aan hulle gekom het 'n Warner.

trans-unit.source: Has he made the gods [only] one God? Indeed, this is a curious thing."
trans-unit.target: Het hy die gode [net] een God gemaak?

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among them went forth, [saying], "Continue, and be patient over [the defense of] your gods. Indeed, this is a thing intended.
trans-unit.target: En die vooraanstaande onder hulle uittrek, het [sê], "Gaan voort, en wees geduldig oor [die verdediging van] jou gode. Dit is inderdaad 'n ding bedoel.

trans-unit.source: We have not heard of this in the latest religion. This is not but a fabrication.
trans-unit.target: Ons het nog nie gehoor van hierdie in die jongste godsdiens.

trans-unit.source: Has the message been revealed to him out of [all of] us?" Rather, they are in doubt about My message. Rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.
trans-unit.target: Het die boodskap nie aan hom geopenbaar uit [al] ons? "Inteendeel, hulle is in twyfel oor My boodskap. Inteendeel, het hulle nog nie geproe My skuld.

trans-unit.source: Or do they have the depositories of the mercy of your Lord, the Exalted in Might, the Bestower?
trans-unit.target: Of het hulle die deposito van die genade van jou God, die Almagtige, die Milddadige?

trans-unit.source: Or is theirs the dominion of the heavens and the earth and what is between them? Then let them ascend through [any] ways of access.
trans-unit.target: Of is hulle s'n die koninkryk van die hemele en die aarde en wat tussen hulle?

trans-unit.source: [They are but] soldiers [who will be] defeated there among the companies [of disbelievers].
trans-unit.target: [Hulle is maar] soldate [wat sal wees] verslaan daar onder die maatskappye [van ongelowiges].

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them, and [the tribe of] 'Aad and Pharaoh, the owner of stakes,
trans-unit.target: Die mense van Noag verloën word voor hulle, en [die stam van] 'Aad en Farao die eienaar van belange,

trans-unit.source: And [the tribe of] Thamud and the people of Lot and the companions of the thicket. Those are the companies.
trans-unit.target: En [die stam van] Samoed en die volk van Lot en die bewoners van die bos.

trans-unit.source: Each of them denied the messengers, so My penalty was justified.
trans-unit.target: Elkeen van hulle ontken die boodskappers, sodat My straf geregverdig is.

trans-unit.source: And these [disbelievers] await not but one blast [of the Horn]; for it there will be no delay.
trans-unit.target: En dit [ongelowiges] wag nie, maar een ontploffing [van die horing];

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Our Lord, hasten for us our share [of the punishment] before the Day of Account"
trans-unit.target: En hulle sê: "Ons Here, maak tog gou vir ons ons aandeel [van die straf] voor die Dag van rekening"

trans-unit.source: Be patient over what they say and remember Our servant, David, the possessor of strength; indeed, he was one who repeatedly turned back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Wees geduldig oor wat hulle sê en onthou Ons dienaar, Dawid, die Skepper van krag;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We subjected the mountains [to praise] with him, exalting [Allah] in the [late] afternoon and [after] sunrise.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons onderwerp die berge [om lof] saam met hom, verhef [Allah] in die [laat] middag en [na] sonsopkoms.

trans-unit.source: And the birds were assembled, all with him repeating [praises].
trans-unit.target: En die voëls het byeengekom, al met hom te herhaal [lof].

trans-unit.source: And We strengthened his kingdom and gave him wisdom and discernment in speech.
trans-unit.target: En Ons versterk sy koninkryk en hom wysheid en onderskeiding in spraak.

trans-unit.source: And has there come to you the news of the adversaries, when they climbed over the wall of [his] prayer chamber -
trans-unit.target: En het daar na jou toe kom die nuus van die vyande, wanneer hulle klim oor die muur van [sy] gebed kamer -

trans-unit.source: When they entered upon David and he was alarmed by them? They said, "Fear not. [We are] two adversaries, one of whom has wronged the other, so judge between us with truth and do not exceed [it] and guide us to the sound path.
trans-unit.target: Toe hulle aangegaan oor Dawid vaardig geword, en hy was bekommerd oor hulle?

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, my brother, has ninety-nine ewes, and I have one ewe; so he said, 'Entrust her to me,' and he overpowered me in speech."
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad hierdie, my broer, het nege en negentig ooie, en ek het 'n ooi,

trans-unit.source: [David] said, "He has certainly wronged you in demanding your ewe [in addition] to his ewes. And indeed, many associates oppress one another, except for those who believe and do righteous deeds - and few are they." And David became certain that We had tried him, and he asked forgiveness of his Lord and fell down bowing [in prostration] and turned in repentance [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: [David] het gesê: ". Hy het jou beslis na gekom in veeleisende jou ooi [benewens] om sy ooie en inderdaad, baie geassosieerdes onderdruk mekaar, behalwe vir diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen - en daar is min."

trans-unit.source: So We forgave him that; and indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
trans-unit.target: So Ons vergewe hom wat;

trans-unit.source: [We said], "O David, indeed We have made you a successor upon the earth, so judge between the people in truth and do not follow [your own] desire, as it will lead you astray from the way of Allah." Indeed, those who go astray from the way of Allah will have a severe punishment for having forgotten the Day of Account.
trans-unit.target: [Ons het], "O Dawid, inderdaad Ons het jou 'n opvolger op die aarde, sodat oordeel tussen die mense in die waarheid het en volg nie [jou eie] begeerte, want dit julle mislei sal lei uit die weg van Allah."

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and the earth and that between them aimlessly. That is the assumption of those who disbelieve, so woe to those who disbelieve from the Fire.
trans-unit.target: En ons het nie die hemel en die aarde en wat tussen hulle doelloos te skep.

trans-unit.source: Or should we treat those who believe and do righteous deeds like corrupters in the land? Or should We treat those who fear Allah like the wicked?
trans-unit.target: Of moet ons die wat glo en goeie werke doen soos verderflik in die land?

trans-unit.source: [This is] a blessed Book which We have revealed to you, [O Muhammad], that they might reflect upon its verses and that those of understanding would be reminded.
trans-unit.target: [Dit is] 'n geseënde boek wat ons aan julle geopenbaar word, [O Muhammad], sodat hulle iets kon besin oor sy verse en dat die verstandiges sal herinner word.

trans-unit.source: And to David We gave Solomon. An excellent servant, indeed he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: En Dawid Ons het aan Salomo.

trans-unit.source: [Mention] when there were exhibited before him in the afternoon the poised [standing] racehorses.
trans-unit.target: [Noem] wanneer daar voor hom in die middag die regop [staande] renperde uitgestal.

trans-unit.source: And he said, "Indeed, I gave preference to the love of good [things] over the remembrance of my Lord until the sun disappeared into the curtain [of darkness]."
trans-unit.target: En hy antwoord: "Ja, ek het voorkeur aan die liefde van goeie [dinge] oor die herdenking van my Here totdat die son in die gordyn [duisternis] verdwyn."

trans-unit.source: [He said], "Return them to me," and set about striking [their] legs and necks.
trans-unit.target: [Hy het gesê], "terug te bring na my," en stel oor staking [hul] bene en nekke.

trans-unit.source: And We certainly tried Solomon and placed on his throne a body; then he returned.
trans-unit.target: En ons beslis probeer Salomo en op sy troon 'n liggaam;

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, forgive me and grant me a kingdom such as will not belong to anyone after me. Indeed, You are the Bestower."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "My Here, vergewe my en gee my 'n koninkryk soos sal behoort nie aan iemand agter My aan. Inderdaad, U is die Milddadige."

trans-unit.source: So We subjected to him the wind blowing by his command, gently, wherever he directed,
trans-unit.target: So Ons aan hom onderwerp is die wind waai deur sy bevel, liggies, waar hy gerig word,

trans-unit.source: And [also] the devils [of jinn] - every builder and diver
trans-unit.target: En [ook] die duiwels [van djinn] - elke bouer en duiker

trans-unit.source: And others bound together in shackles.
trans-unit.target: En ander saamgebind in boeie.

trans-unit.source: [We said], "This is Our gift, so grant or withhold without account."
trans-unit.target: [Ons het], "Dit is ons geskenk, so toe te staan of te weerhou sonder rekening."

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for him is nearness to Us and a good place of return.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, vir hom is nabyheid aan ons en 'n goeie plek van terugkeer.

trans-unit.source: And remember Our servant Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, Satan has touched me with hardship and torment."
trans-unit.target: En onthou Ons dienaar Job verander toe hy geroep is om sy Here, "Inderdaad, Satan het My aangeraak met swaarkry en lyding."

trans-unit.source: [So he was told], "Strike [the ground] with your foot; this is a [spring for] a cool bath and drink."
trans-unit.target: [En hy het is], "Staking [die grond] met jou voet, dit is 'n [lente vir] 'n koel bad en drink."

trans-unit.source: And We granted him his family and a like [number] with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: En Ons verleen hom sy familie en 'n soortgelyke [aantal] met hulle as genade van ons en 'n herinnering vir diegene van begrip.

trans-unit.source: [We said], "And take in your hand a bunch [of grass] and strike with it and do not break your oath." Indeed, We found him patient, an excellent servant. Indeed, he was one repeatedly turning back [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: [Ons het], "En in jou hand 'n klomp [gras] en slaan daarmee en moenie jou eed verbreek nie."

trans-unit.source: And remember Our servants, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob - those of strength and [religious] vision.
trans-unit.target: En onthou Ons dienaars Abraham, Isak en Jakob - dié van krag en [godsdienstige] visie.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We chose them for an exclusive quality: remembrance of the home [of the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, Ons het hulle vir 'n eksklusiewe gehalte: die herdenking van die huis [van die Hiernamaals].

trans-unit.source: And indeed they are, to Us, among the chosen and outstanding.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad is dit, om ons, onder die gekose en uitstaande.

trans-unit.source: And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.
trans-unit.target: En onthou Ismael, Elisa en page-Kifl, en al is een van die uitstaande.

trans-unit.source: This is a reminder. And indeed, for the righteous is a good place of return
trans-unit.target: Dit is 'n herinnering.

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence, whose doors will be opened to them.
trans-unit.target: Gardens van ewige woning, waarvan die deure sal oopgaan vir hulle.

trans-unit.source: Reclining within them, they will call therein for abundant fruit and drink.
trans-unit.target: Tafel binne, sal hulle daarin bel vir 'n ryk vrugte en drink.

trans-unit.source: And with them will be women limiting [their] glances and of equal age.
trans-unit.target: En saam met hulle sal wees vroue beperk [hul] blik en van gelyke ouderdom.

trans-unit.source: This is what you, [the righteous], are promised for the Day of Account.
trans-unit.target: Dit is wat jy, [die regverdige], is belowe vir die Dag van rekening.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is Our provision; for it there is no depletion.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, dit is ons voorsiening;

trans-unit.source: This [is so]. But indeed, for the transgressors is an evil place of return -
trans-unit.target: Dit [is so].

trans-unit.source: Hell, which they will [enter to] burn, and wretched is the resting place.
trans-unit.target: Hel, wat hulle sal [betree om] verbrand, en ellendig is die rusplek.

trans-unit.source: This - so let them taste it - is scalding water and [foul] purulence.
trans-unit.target: Dit - so laat hulle smaak dit - is kokend water en [vieslike] etteren.

trans-unit.source: And other [punishments] of its type [in various] kinds.
trans-unit.target: En 'n ander [strawwe] van sy soort [in verskeie] soorte.

trans-unit.source: [Its inhabitants will say], "This is a company bursting in with you. No welcome for them. Indeed, they will burn in the Fire."
trans-unit.target: [Die inwoners sal sê]: "Dit is 'n maatskappy bars in met jou. Geen welkom vir hulle. Inderdaad, hulle sal met vuur verbrand word."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Nor you! No welcome for you. You, [our leaders], brought this upon us, and wretched is the settlement."
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal sê: "Ook jy! Geen welkom vir jou. Jy, [ons leiers], het hierdie op ons, en ellendig is die nedersetting."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal sê: "Ons Here, wie het dit op ons -. Styging vir hom dubbele straf in die Vuur"

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Why do we not see men whom we used to count among the worst?
trans-unit.target: En hulle sal sê: "Hoekom het ons nie die mense wat ons gebruik om te tel onder die ergste sien?

trans-unit.source: Is it [because] we took them in ridicule, or has [our] vision turned away from them?"
trans-unit.target: Is dit [omdat] ons hulle het in bespotting, of het [ons] visie afgewyk het van hulle? "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, that is truth - the quarreling of the people of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, dit is die waarheid - die twis van die mense van die Vuur.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I am only a warner, and there is not any deity except Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: Sê [O Muhammad]: "Ek is net 'n Warner, en daar is geen god behalwe Allah, die Een, die heersende.

trans-unit.source: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver."
trans-unit.target: Here van die hemel en die aarde en alles wat daar tussen is, die Almagtige, die Ewigdurende Vergewer. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is great news
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Dit is goeie nuus

trans-unit.source: From which you turn away.
trans-unit.target: Waaruit jy wegdraai.

trans-unit.source: I had no knowledge of the exalted assembly [of angels] when they were disputing [the creation of Adam].
trans-unit.target: Ek het geen kennis van die verhewe vergadering [engele] toe hulle geredeneer [die skepping van Adam].

trans-unit.source: It has not been revealed to me except that I am a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: Dit is nog nie aan my geopenbaar, behalwe dat ek 'n duidelike Warner. "

trans-unit.source: [So mention] when your Lord said to the angels, "Indeed, I am going to create a human being from clay.
trans-unit.target: [So noem] wanneer jou Here vir die engele gesê: "Inderdaad, ek gaan 'n mens te skep uit klei.

trans-unit.source: So when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
trans-unit.target: So toe ek hom in verhouding en blaas in hom van My [geskep] siel, val dan na hom afgegaan in uitputting. "

trans-unit.source: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely.
trans-unit.target: So het die engele gegooi - almal van hulle geheel en al.

trans-unit.source: Except Iblees; he was arrogant and became among the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe Iblees;

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "O Iblees, what prevented you from prostrating to that which I created with My hands? Were you arrogant [then], or were you [already] among the haughty?"
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "O Iblees, wat jy verhoed gooi om dit wat ek gemaak het met my hande? Was jy arrogant [dan], of was jy [reeds] onder die hoogmoediges?"

trans-unit.source: He said, "I am better than him. You created me from fire and created him from clay."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "Ek is beter as hy. Jy geskep my uit vuur en hom geskape uit klei."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Then get out of Paradise, for indeed, you are expelled.
trans-unit.target: [Allah] sê: "Dan kry uit die Paradys, vir inderdaad, jy geskors.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, oor julle is My vloek tot die dag van vergelding. "

trans-unit.source: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
trans-unit.target: Hy het gesê: "My Here, dan uitstel my tot die dag dat hulle opgewek."

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "So ja, jy is van diegene begenadig

trans-unit.source: Until the Day of the time well-known."
trans-unit.target: Tot op die dag van die tyd bekend. "

trans-unit.source: [Iblees] said, "By your might, I will surely mislead them all
trans-unit.target: [Iblees] sê: "Deur jou krag, sal ek sekerlik mislei hulle almal

trans-unit.source: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
trans-unit.target: Behalwe, onder hulle, U uitverkore dienaars. "

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "The truth [is My oath], and the truth I say -
trans-unit.target: [Allah] het gesê: "Die waarheid [is My eed], en die waarheid sê ek -

trans-unit.source: [That] I will surely fill Hell with you and those of them that follow you all together."
trans-unit.target: [Dit] Ek sal sekerlik die hel te vul met jou en dié van hulle wat jou alles bymekaar te volg. "

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "I do not ask you for the Qur'an any payment, and I am not of the pretentious
trans-unit.target: Sê, [O Muhammad], "Ek vra nie dat jy vra vir die Koran enige betaling, en ek is nie van die pretensieuse

trans-unit.source: It is but a reminder to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Dit is maar 'n herinnering aan die wêreld.

trans-unit.source: And you will surely know [the truth of] its information after a time."
trans-unit.target: En jy sal sekerlik weet [die waarheid van] sy inligting na 'n tyd. "

trans-unit.source: The revelation of the Qur'an is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Die openbaring van die Koran is Allah, die Almagtige, die Wyse.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have sent down to you the Book, [O Muhammad], in truth. So worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons het in die Boek, [O Muhammad] in waarheid na julle gestuur.

trans-unit.source: Unquestionably, for Allah is the pure religion. And those who take protectors besides Him [say], "We only worship them that they may bring us nearer to Allah in position." Indeed, Allah will judge between them concerning that over which they differ. Indeed, Allah does not guide he who is a liar and [confirmed] disbeliever.
trans-unit.target: Ongetwyfeld, want Allah is die suiwer godsdiens.

trans-unit.source: If Allah had intended to take a son, He could have chosen from what He creates whatever He willed. Exalted is He; He is Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: As Allah bedoel het om 'n seun te neem, kon Hy gekies het as wat Hy skep wat Hy wou.

trans-unit.source: He created the heavens and earth in truth. He wraps the night over the day and wraps the day over the night and has subjected the sun and the moon, each running [its course] for a specified term. Unquestionably, He is the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Hy het die hemel en die aarde in waarheid.

trans-unit.source: He created you from one soul. Then He made from it its mate, and He produced for you from the grazing livestock eight mates. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, within three darknesses. That is Allah, your Lord; to Him belongs dominion. There is no deity except Him, so how are you averted?
trans-unit.target: Hy het jou uit een siel.

trans-unit.source: If you disbelieve - indeed, Allah is Free from need of you. And He does not approve for His servants disbelief. And if you are grateful, He approves it for you; and no bearer of burdens will bear the burden of another. Then to your Lord is your return, and He will inform you about what you used to do. Indeed, He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: As jy nie glo - inderdaad, Allah is vry van die behoefte van jou.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon his Lord, turning to Him [alone]; then when He bestows on him a favor from Himself, he forgets Him whom he called upon before, and he attributes to Allah equals to mislead [people] from His way. Say, "Enjoy your disbelief for a little; indeed, you are of the companions of the Fire."
trans-unit.target: En toe teenspoed man raak, noem hy op sy Here het omgedraai en vir hom [alleen];

trans-unit.source: Is one who is devoutly obedient during periods of the night, prostrating and standing [in prayer], fearing the Hereafter and hoping for the mercy of his Lord, [like one who does not]? Say, "Are those who know equal to those who do not know?" Only they will remember [who are] people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Is iemand wat toegewyde gehoorsaam gedurende tydperke van die nag, gaan gooi en staan [in gebed], vrees die Hiernamaals en hoop vir die genade van die Here, [soos een wat nie doen]?

trans-unit.source: Say, "O My servants who have believed, fear your Lord. For those who do good in this world is good, and the earth of Allah is spacious. Indeed, the patient will be given their reward without account."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "O my dienaars wat gelowig geword het, vrees jou Here. Vir diegene wat goed doen in hierdie wêreld is goed, en die aarde van Allah is ruim. Inderdaad, sal die pasiënt hul loon weg sonder ag gegee."

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been commanded to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion.
trans-unit.target: Sê [O Muhammad], "Inderdaad, ek het beveel Allah te aanbid, [wat] opregte Hom in geloof.

trans-unit.source: And I have been commanded to be the first [among you] of the Muslims."
trans-unit.target: En ek is beveel die eerste te wees [onder julle] van die Moslems. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "Indeed I fear, if I should disobey my Lord, the punishment of a tremendous Day."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "Waarlik, ek vrees, as ek my Here, die straf van 'n geweldige dag moet gehoorsaam."

trans-unit.source: Say, "Allah [alone] do I worship, sincere to Him in my religion,
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Allah [alleen] ek aanbid, opreg Hom in my godsdiens,

trans-unit.source: So worship what you will besides Him." Say, "Indeed, the losers are the ones who will lose themselves and their families on the Day of Resurrection. Unquestionably, that is the manifest loss."
trans-unit.target: So aanbid wat julle sal buiten Hom nie. "Sê," Inderdaad, die verloorders is hulle wat hulself en hul gesinne sal verloor op die dag van die opstanding.

trans-unit.source: They will have canopies of fire above them and below them, canopies. By that Allah threatens His servants. O My servants, then fear Me.
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal afdakke van vuur het bo hulle en onder hulle, afdakke.

trans-unit.source: But those who have avoided Taghut, lest they worship it, and turned back to Allah - for them are good tidings. So give good tidings to My servants
trans-unit.target: Maar diegene wat Taghut vermy, sodat hulle nie dien nie, en sy het teruggegaan na Allah - vir hulle is 'n goeie tyding.

trans-unit.source: Who listen to speech and follow the best of it. Those are the ones Allah has guided, and those are people of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Wie luister na spraak en volg die beste daarvan.

trans-unit.source: Then, is one who has deserved the decree of punishment [to be guided]? Then, can you save one who is in the Fire?
trans-unit.target: Dan, is een wat verdien die bevel van straf [gelei]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have feared their Lord - for them are chambers, above them chambers built high, beneath which rivers flow. [This is] the promise of Allah. Allah does not fail in [His] promise.
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle wat die Here gevrees het - vir hulle is kamers, bo hulle kamers gebou hoog, waardeur riviere strome.

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah sends down rain from the sky and makes it flow as springs [and rivers] in the earth; then He produces thereby crops of varying colors; then they dry and you see them turned yellow; then He makes them [scattered] debris. Indeed in that is a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Het jy nie sien dat Allah stuur af stortreën uit die hemel en maak dit vloei soos vere [en riviere] op die aarde;

trans-unit.source: So is one whose breast Allah has expanded to [accept] Islam and he is upon a light from his Lord [like one whose heart rejects it]? Then woe to those whose hearts are hardened against the remembrance of Allah. Those are in manifest error.
trans-unit.target: So is een wie se bors Allah het uitgebrei tot [aanvaar] Islam en hy is op 'n lig van die Here [soos een wie se hart verwerp dit]?

trans-unit.source: Allah has sent down the best statement: a consistent Book wherein is reiteration. The skins shiver therefrom of those who fear their Lord; then their skins and their hearts relax at the remembrance of Allah. That is the guidance of Allah by which He guides whom He wills. And one whom Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
trans-unit.target: Allah het toe gestuur die beste verklaring: 'n konsekwente Book waar 'n mens herhaling.

trans-unit.source: Then is he who will shield with his face the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection [like one secure from it]? And it will be said to the wrongdoers, "Taste what you used to earn."
trans-unit.target: Dan is hy wat sal beskerm met sy gesig die ergste van die straf op die Dag van die opstanding [soos 'n veilige daaruit]?

trans-unit.source: Those before them denied, and punishment came upon them from where they did not perceive.
trans-unit.target: Diegene voor hulle ontken, en straf op hulle afgekom waar hulle nie sien nie.

trans-unit.source: So Allah made them taste disgrace in worldly life. But the punishment of the Hereafter is greater, if they only knew.
trans-unit.target: So Allah het hulle smaak skande in aardse lewe.

trans-unit.source: And We have certainly presented for the people in this Qur'an from every [kind of] example - that they might remember.
trans-unit.target: En ons het beslis aangebied vir die mense in die Koran uit elke [soort] byvoorbeeld - dat hulle kan onthou.

trans-unit.source: [It is] an Arabic Qur'an, without any deviance that they might become righteous.
trans-unit.target: [Dit is] 'n Arabiese Koran, sonder enige afwyking dat hulle regverdig kan word.

trans-unit.source: Allah presents an example: a slave owned by quarreling partners and another belonging exclusively to one man - are they equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! But most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: Allah bied 'n voorbeeld: 'n slaaf in besit van twis vennote en ander eksklusief wat deel uitmaak van 'n man - hulle gelyk in vergelyking?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you are to die, and indeed, they are to die.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, jy is om te sterf, en inderdaad, dit is om te sterf.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, before your Lord, will dispute.
trans-unit.target: Dan sou jy, op die dag van die opstanding, voor jou Here, sal betwis.

trans-unit.source: So who is more unjust than one who lies about Allah and denies the truth when it has come to him? Is there not in Hell a residence for the disbelievers?
trans-unit.target: So wat is meer onreg doen as een wat leuens oor Allah en ontken die waarheid wanneer dit aan hom kom?

trans-unit.source: And the one who has brought the truth and [they who] believed in it - those are the righteous.
trans-unit.target: En die een wat die waarheid gebring het en [hulle wat] geglo in dit - dit is die regverdige.

trans-unit.source: They will have whatever they desire with their Lord. That is the reward of the doers of good -
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal verkry net wat hulle wil met hul Here.

trans-unit.source: That Allah may remove from them the worst of what they did and reward them their due for the best of what they used to do.
trans-unit.target: Dat Allah die ergste van wat hulle gedoen het, kan verwyder van hulle en hom vergeld na sy verskuldig vir die beste van wat hulle gebruik om te doen.

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah sufficient for His Servant [Prophet Muhammad]? And [yet], they threaten you with those [they worship] other than Him. And whoever Allah leaves astray - for him there is no guide.
trans-unit.target: Is Allah nie genoegsaam vir sy Dienaar [profeet Mohammed]?

trans-unit.source: And whoever Allah guides - for him there is no misleader. Is not Allah Exalted in Might and Owner of Retribution?
trans-unit.target: En elkeen wat Allah lei - vir hom is daar geen misleader.

trans-unit.source: And if you asked them, "Who created the heavens and the earth?" they would surely say, "Allah." Say, "Then have you considered what you invoke besides Allah? If Allah intended me harm, are they removers of His harm; or if He intended me mercy, are they withholders of His mercy?" Say, "Sufficient for me is Allah; upon Him [alone] rely the [wise] reliers."
trans-unit.target: En as jy hulle vra: "Wie die hemel en die aarde geskape?"

trans-unit.source: Say, "O my people, work according to your position, [for] indeed, I am working; and you are going to know
trans-unit.target: Sê: "O my volk, werk volgens jou posisie, [vir] inderdaad, ek werk, en jy gaan om te weet

trans-unit.source: To whom will come a torment disgracing him and on whom will descend an enduring punishment."
trans-unit.target: By wie wil 'n pyniging kom hom skande en op wie sal 'n blywende straf neerdaal. "

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent down to you the Book for the people in truth. So whoever is guided - it is for [the benefit of] his soul; and whoever goes astray only goes astray to its detriment. And you are not a manager over them.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons gestuur om jou die Boek vir die mense in die waarheid.

trans-unit.source: Allah takes the souls at the time of their death, and those that do not die [He takes] during their sleep. Then He keeps those for which He has decreed death and releases the others for a specified term. Indeed in that are signs for a people who give thought.
trans-unit.target: Allah neem die siele ten tyde van hul dood, en diegene wat nie sterf [Hy neem] in hul slaap.

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken other than Allah as intercessors? Say, "Even though they do not possess [power over] anything, nor do they reason?"
trans-unit.target: Of het hulle geneem behalwe Allah as intersessors?

trans-unit.source: Say, "To Allah belongs [the right to allow] intercession entirely. To Him belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. Then to Him you will be returned."
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Aan Allah behoort [die reg om toe te laat] voorbidding heeltemal. Aan Hom behoort die koninkryk van die hemele en die aarde. En aan Hom sal jy nie terug gebring."

trans-unit.source: And when Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter shrink with aversion, but when those [worshipped] other than Him are mentioned, immediately they rejoice.
trans-unit.target: Toe Allah alleen ter sprake kom, die harte van diegene wat nie glo in die Hiernamaals krimp met weersin, maar wanneer daardie [aanbid] buiten Hom genoem, onmiddellik hulle verbly.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O Allah, Creator of the heavens and the earth, Knower of the unseen and the witnessed, You will judge between your servants concerning that over which they used to differ."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "O Allah, die Skepper van die hemel en die aarde, Kenner van die onsigbare en die getuie, Jy sal oordeel tussen u dienaars met betrekking tot daardie waaroor hulle gebruik om te verskil."

trans-unit.source: And if those who did wrong had all that is in the earth entirely and the like of it with it, they would [attempt to] ransom themselves thereby from the worst of the punishment on the Day of Resurrection. And there will appear to them from Allah that which they had not taken into account.
trans-unit.target: En as diegene wat verkeerd was alles wat op die aarde is geheel en al en dies meer van dit gepaard gaan, sou hulle [poging om] losprys hulself sodoende uit die ergste van die straf op die dag van die opstanding.

trans-unit.source: And there will appear to them the evils they had earned, and they will be enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: En daar sal verskyn aan hulle die euwels wat hulle verdien het, en hulle sal omvou deur wat hulle gebruik om bespotting.

trans-unit.source: And when adversity touches man, he calls upon Us; then when We bestow on him a favor from Us, he says, "I have only been given it because of [my] knowledge." Rather, it is a trial, but most of them do not know.
trans-unit.target: En toe teenspoed man raak, noem hy ons getref

trans-unit.source: Those before them had already said it, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Diegene voor hulle het reeds gesê dit, maar hulle was nie beskikbaar gemaak word deur dit wat hulle gebruik om te verdien.

trans-unit.source: And the evil consequences of what they earned struck them. And those who have wronged of these [people] will be afflicted by the evil consequences of what they earned; and they will not cause failure.
trans-unit.target: Maar die bose gevolge van wat hulle verdien het hulle verslaan.

trans-unit.source: Do they not know that Allah extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it]? Indeed in that are signs for a people who believe.
trans-unit.target: Weet hulle nie dat Allah strek voorsiening vir wie Hy wil en beperk [dit]?

trans-unit.source: Say, "O My servants who have transgressed against themselves [by sinning], do not despair of the mercy of Allah. Indeed, Allah forgives all sins. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "O my dienaars wat teen hulself [deur sonde] oortree, moenie moed opgee nie van die genade van Allah. Voorwaar, Allah al my sonde vergewe. Inteendeel, dit is Hy wat die Gezind, Genadevol."

trans-unit.source: And return [in repentance] to your Lord and submit to Him before the punishment comes upon you; then you will not be helped.
trans-unit.target: En terugkeer [met berou] om jou Here en dien Hom voor die straf kom oor julle;

trans-unit.source: And follow the best of what was revealed to you from your Lord before the punishment comes upon you suddenly while you do not perceive,
trans-unit.target: En volg die beste van wat van jou God aan jou geopenbaar voordat die straf kom oor julle skielik terwyl jy nie sien,

trans-unit.source: Lest a soul should say, "Oh [how great is] my regret over what I neglected in regard to Allah and that I was among the mockers."
trans-unit.target: Sodat 'n siel moet sê, "O [hoe groot is] my spyt oor wat ek verwaarloos ten opsigte van Allah is en dat ek onder die spotters."

trans-unit.source: Or [lest] it say, "If only Allah had guided me, I would have been among the righteous."
trans-unit.target: Of [dat] dit sê, "As Allah my gelei het, ek sou gewees het onder die regverdige."

trans-unit.source: Or [lest] it say when it sees the punishment, "If only I had another turn so I could be among the doers of good."
trans-unit.target: Of [dat] dit sê wanneer dit die straf sien, "As ek moes nog 'n beurt en ek kon wees onder die daders van goeie."

trans-unit.source: But yes, there had come to you My verses, but you denied them and were arrogant, and you were among the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Maar ja, daar het julle My verse kom, maar jy dit ontken en was arrogant en jy was een van die ongelowiges.

trans-unit.source: And on the Day of Resurrection you will see those who lied about Allah [with] their faces blackened. Is there not in Hell a residence for the arrogant?
trans-unit.target: En op die dag van die opstanding sal jy diegene wat gelieg oor Allah [met] hul gesigte swart sien.

trans-unit.source: And Allah will save those who feared Him by their attainment; no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.
trans-unit.target: En Allah sal dié wat Hom deur hul bereiking gevrees red;

trans-unit.source: Allah is the Creator of all things, and He is, over all things, Disposer of affairs.
trans-unit.target: Allah is die Skepper van alle dinge, en Hy is, bo alle dinge, Disposer van sake.

trans-unit.source: To Him belong the keys of the heavens and the earth. And they who disbelieve in the verses of Allah - it is those who are the losers.
trans-unit.target: Aan Hom behoort die skatte van die hemel en die aarde.

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Is it other than Allah that you order me to worship, O ignorant ones?"
trans-unit.target: Sê, [O Muhammad], "Is dit anders as Allah dat jy my beveel om te aanbid, o onkundig kinders?"

trans-unit.source: And it was already revealed to you and to those before you that if you should associate [anything] with Allah, your work would surely become worthless, and you would surely be among the losers."
trans-unit.target: En dit is reeds aan u geopenbaar en aan diegene voordat jy dat as jy moet assosieer [iets] met Allah, sou jou werk sekerlik waardeloos geword en sal jy sekerlik een van die verloorders. "

trans-unit.source: Rather, worship [only] Allah and be among the grateful.
trans-unit.target: Inteendeel, aanbidding [net] Allah en onder die dankbaar.

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal, while the earth entirely will be [within] His grip on the Day of Resurrection, and the heavens will be folded in His right hand. Exalted is He and high above what they associate with Him.
trans-unit.target: Hulle het nie beoordeel Allah met ware waardering, terwyl die aarde geheel en al sal wees [binne] Sy greep op die Dag van die opstanding, en die hemel sal in sy regterhand gevou.

trans-unit.source: And the Horn will be blown, and whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth will fall dead except whom Allah wills. Then it will be blown again, and at once they will be standing, looking on.
trans-unit.target: En die Horn sal geblaas word, en elkeen wat in die hemel is en wie is op die aarde sal dood behalwe wie Allah wil val.

trans-unit.source: And the earth will shine with the light of its Lord, and the record [of deeds] will be placed, and the prophets and the witnesses will be brought, and it will be judged between them in truth, and they will not be wronged.
trans-unit.target: En die aarde sal skyn met die lig van die Here, en die rekord [van dade] geplaas sal word, en die profete en die getuies sal word, en dit sal geoordeel word tussen hulle in waarheid en hulle sal geen onreg gedoen word.

trans-unit.source: And every soul will be fully compensated [for] what it did; and He is most knowing of what they do.
trans-unit.target: En elke siel sal ten volle vergoed word [vir] wat dit gedoen het;

trans-unit.source: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Hell in groups until, when they reach it, its gates are opened and its keepers will say, "Did there not come to you messengers from yourselves, reciting to you the verses of your Lord and warning you of the meeting of this Day of yours?" They will say, "Yes, but the word of punishment has come into effect upon the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: En diegene wat nie geglo sal na die Hel gedryf in groepe totdat hulle bereik het, sy poorte oop en sy wagte sal sê: "Het daar nie na jou toe kom boodskappers van julle, voordrag aan u die verse van die Here en die waarskuwing wat jy

trans-unit.source: [To them] it will be said, "Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
trans-unit.target: [Om hulle] sal dit gesê word, "Gee die hekke van die hel tot in ewigheid daarin bly, en ellendig is die woning van die arrogante."

trans-unit.source: But those who feared their Lord will be driven to Paradise in groups until, when they reach it while its gates have been opened and its keepers say, "Peace be upon you; you have become pure; so enter it to abide eternally therein," [they will enter].
trans-unit.target: Maar diegene wat gevrees hulle Here sal tot Paradise gedryf in groepe totdat, wanneer hulle dit bereik, terwyl sy poorte is oop en sy wagte sê, "Vrede vir julle, jy suiwer geword het, so tik dit om vir ewig daarin bly,"

trans-unit.source: And they will say, "Praise to Allah, who has fulfilled for us His promise and made us inherit the earth [so] we may settle in Paradise wherever we will. And excellent is the reward of [righteous] workers."
trans-unit.target: En hulle sal sê: "Alle lof aan Allah, wat vervul vir ons Sy belofte en het ons erfgename van die aarde [so] ons kan vestig in die Paradys waar ons wil. En heerlik is die beloning van [regverdige] werkers."

trans-unit.source: And you will see the angels surrounding the Throne, exalting [Allah] with praise of their Lord. And it will be judged between them in truth, and it will be said, "[All] praise to Allah, Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: En jy sal die engele rondom die troon, verhef [Allah] met lof van die Here sien.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: The revelation of the Book is from Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: Die openbaring van hierdie boek is van Allah, die Almagtige, die Alwetende.

trans-unit.source: The forgiver of sin, acceptor of repentance, severe in punishment, owner of abundance. There is no deity except Him; to Him is the destination.
trans-unit.target: Die Vergewer van sonde, ontvanger van bekering, swaar in straf, eienaar van oorvloed.

trans-unit.source: No one disputes concerning the signs of Allah except those who disbelieve, so be not deceived by their [uninhibited] movement throughout the land.
trans-unit.target: Niemand geskille met betrekking tot die tekens van Allah, behalwe diegene wat nie glo, so nie die hele land mislei word deur hul [ongeremd] beweging.

trans-unit.source: The people of Noah denied before them and the [disbelieving] factions after them, and every nation intended [a plot] for their messenger to seize him, and they disputed by [using] falsehood to [attempt to] invalidate thereby the truth. So I seized them, and how [terrible] was My penalty.
trans-unit.target: Die mense van Noag verloën word voor hulle en die [ongelowige] faksies agter hulle, en al die nasies bedoel [ 'n plot] vir hul boodskapper na hom om te gryp, en hulle betwis word deur [behulp] leuens te [poging om] ongeldig sodoende die waarheid.

trans-unit.source: And thus has the word of your Lord come into effect upon those who disbelieved that they are companions of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: En het dus die woord van jou Here in werking tree op diegene wat nie geglo dat hulle metgeselle van die Vuur.

trans-unit.source: Those [angels] who carry the Throne and those around it exalt [Allah] with praise of their Lord and believe in Him and ask forgiveness for those who have believed, [saying], "Our Lord, You have encompassed all things in mercy and knowledge, so forgive those who have repented and followed Your way and protect them from the punishment of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Diegene [engele] wat die troon en die mense rondom dit verhef [Allah] met lof van die Here en in Hom glo en vra om vergifnis vir diegene wat geglo het dra, [sê]: "Ons Here, U het alles omvat in genade en

trans-unit.source: Our Lord, and admit them to gardens of perpetual residence which You have promised them and whoever was righteous among their fathers, their spouses and their offspring. Indeed, it is You who is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
trans-unit.target: Ons Here, en erken dat hulle tuine van ewige woning wat U oor hulle spreek en wie was reg onder hulle vaders, hul gades en hul nageslag.

trans-unit.source: And protect them from the evil consequences [of their deeds]. And he whom You protect from evil consequences that Day - You will have given him mercy. And that is the great attainment."
trans-unit.target: En hulle te beskerm teen die bose gevolge [van hul werke].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who disbelieve will be addressed, "The hatred of Allah for you was [even] greater than your hatred of yourselves [this Day in Hell] when you were invited to faith, but you refused."
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat nie glo sal aangespreek word, "Die haat van Allah vir jou is [selfs] groter as jou haat teen julle [hierdie dag in die hel] wanneer jy genooi om geloof nie, maar jy het geweier."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Our Lord, You made us lifeless twice and gave us life twice, and we have confessed our sins. So is there to an exit any way?"
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal sê: "Ons Here, U ons lewelose twee keer gemaak en het vir ons lewe twee keer, en ons het ons sondes bely. So is daar 'n uitgang op enige manier?"

trans-unit.source: [They will be told], "That is because, when Allah was called upon alone, you disbelieved; but if others were associated with Him, you believed. So the judgement is with Allah, the Most High, the Grand."
trans-unit.target: [Hulle sal ingelig], "Dit is omdat, wanneer Allah is opgeroep alleen, jy geglo; maar as ander is wat verband hou met hom, jy geglo So het die reg by Allah, die Allerhoogste, die Grand.."

trans-unit.source: It is He who shows you His signs and sends down to you from the sky, provision. But none will remember except he who turns back [in repentance].
trans-unit.target: Dit is Hy wat wys jou sy tekens en stuur af vir julle van die hemel, voorsiening.

trans-unit.source: So invoke Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, although the disbelievers dislike it.
trans-unit.target: So roep Allah, [wat] opregte Hom in geloof, hoewel die ongelowiges laaik dit.

trans-unit.source: [He is] the Exalted above [all] degrees, Owner of the Throne; He places the inspiration of His command upon whom He wills of His servants to warn of the Day of Meeting.
trans-unit.target: [Hy is] die verhewe bo [al] grade, eienaar van die troon is,

trans-unit.source: The Day they come forth nothing concerning them will be concealed from Allah. To whom belongs [all] sovereignty this Day? To Allah, the One, the Prevailing.
trans-unit.target: Die Dag hulle uittrek niks aangaande hulle sal verborge Allah.

trans-unit.source: This Day every soul will be recompensed for what it earned. No injustice today! Indeed, Allah is swift in account.
trans-unit.target: This Day elke siel sal vergeld vir wat dit verdien.

trans-unit.source: And warn them, [O Muhammad], of the Approaching Day, when hearts are at the throats, filled [with distress]. For the wrongdoers there will be no devoted friend and no intercessor [who is] obeyed.
trans-unit.target: En waarsku hulle, [O Muhammad], van die naderende dag, wanneer harte is op die kele, gevul [met nood].

trans-unit.source: He knows that which deceives the eyes and what the breasts conceal.
trans-unit.target: Hy weet dat Hy wat die oë en wat die borste verberg mislei.

trans-unit.source: And Allah judges with truth, while those they invoke besides Him judge not with anything. Indeed, Allah - He is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: En Allah regters met die waarheid, terwyl diegene wat hulle beroep buiten Hom oordeel nie met enigiets.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those who were before them? They were greater than them in strength and in impression on the land, but Allah seized them for their sins. And they had not from Allah any protector.
trans-unit.target: Het hulle nie deur die land en waargeneem hoe was die einde van diegene wat voor hulle was?

trans-unit.source: That was because their messengers were coming to them with clear proofs, but they disbelieved, so Allah seized them. Indeed, He is Powerful and severe in punishment.
trans-unit.target: Dit was as gevolg van hul boodskappers gekom om hulle met duidelike tekens, maar hulle nie geglo, sodat Allah beslag gelê het.

trans-unit.source: And We did certainly send Moses with Our signs and a clear authority
trans-unit.target: En ons het beslis stuur Moses met Ons tekens en 'n duidelik gesag

trans-unit.source: To Pharaoh, Haman and Qarun; but they said, "[He is] a magician and a liar."
trans-unit.target: Om Farao Haman en Qarun;

trans-unit.source: And when he brought them the truth from Us, they said, "Kill the sons of those who have believed with him and keep their women alive." But the plan of the disbelievers is not except in error.
trans-unit.target: En het toe hulle deur die waarheid van ons, het hulle gesê: "Kill the seuns van diegene wat geglo het saam met hom en die lewe te hou hul vroue."

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "Let me kill Moses and let him call upon his Lord. Indeed, I fear that he will change your religion or that he will cause corruption in the land."
trans-unit.target: Maar Farao antwoord: "Laat my Moses dood te maak en laat hom roep sy Here. Inderdaad, ek vrees dat hy jou godsdiens sal verander of dat hy sal korrupsie veroorsaak in die land."

trans-unit.source: But Moses said, "Indeed, I have sought refuge in my Lord and your Lord from every arrogant one who does not believe in the Day of Account."
trans-unit.target: Maar Moses het gesê: "Ja, ek het toevlug dien vanweë elke arrogante een wat nie glo in die dag van rekening gesoek in my Here en jou God."

trans-unit.source: And a believing man from the family of Pharaoh who concealed his faith said, "Do you kill a man [merely] because he says, 'My Lord is Allah' while he has brought you clear proofs from your Lord? And if he should be lying, then upon him is [the consequence of] his lie; but if he should be truthful, there will strike you some of what he promises you. Indeed, Allah does not guide one who is a transgressor and a liar.
trans-unit.target: En 'n gelowige man uit die familie van Farao wat sy geloof weggesteek het gesê: "Het jy 'n man dood te maak [bloot] want hy sê:" My Here is Allah 'terwyl hy jou van jou God gebring het duidelike tekens? En as hy moet wees

trans-unit.source: O my people, sovereignty is yours today, [your being] dominant in the land. But who would protect us from the punishment of Allah if it came to us?" Pharaoh said, "I do not show you except what I see, and I do not guide you except to the way of right conduct."
trans-unit.target: O My volk, soewereiniteit is joune vandag, [jou wese] dominante in die land.

trans-unit.source: And he who believed said, "O my people, indeed I fear for you [a fate] like the day of the companies -
trans-unit.target: En hy wat geglo het, "O my volk, inderdaad Ek vrees vir julle [ 'n lot] soos die dag van die maatskappye -

trans-unit.source: Like the custom of the people of Noah and of 'Aad and Thamud and those after them. And Allah wants no injustice for [His] servants.
trans-unit.target: Soos die gewoonte van die mense van Noag en van 'Aad en Samoed en diegene agter hulle uittrek.

trans-unit.source: And O my people, indeed I fear for you the Day of Calling -
trans-unit.target: En my volk, inderdaad Ek vrees vir julle die Dag van die roeping -

trans-unit.source: The Day you will turn your backs fleeing; there is not for you from Allah any protector. And whoever Allah leaves astray - there is not for him any guide.
trans-unit.target: Die dag sal jy jou rug vlug draai;

trans-unit.source: And Joseph had already come to you before with clear proofs, but you remained in doubt of that which he brought to you, until when he died, you said, 'Never will Allah send a messenger after him.' Thus does Allah leave astray he who is a transgressor and skeptic."
trans-unit.target: En Josef het al vir julle voordat gekom met duidelike tekens, maar jy bly in twyfel van wat hy aan u gebring totdat hy gesterf het, het jy gesê, "Moet nooit sal Allah stuur 'n boodskapper na hom."

trans-unit.source: Those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without an authority having come to them - great is hatred [of them] in the sight of Allah and in the sight of those who have believed. Thus does Allah seal over every heart [belonging to] an arrogant tyrant.
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat geskil oor die tekens van Allah sonder 'n owerheid geword het om hulle - is groot haat [van hulle] in die oë van Allah en in die oë van diegene wat gelowig geword het.

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh said, "O Haman, construct for me a tower that I might reach the ways -
trans-unit.target: Maar Farao antwoord: "O Haman, bou vir my 'n toring wat ek het die weë kan bereik -

trans-unit.source: The ways into the heavens - so that I may look at the deity of Moses; but indeed, I think he is a liar." And thus was made attractive to Pharaoh the evil of his deed, and he was averted from the [right] way. And the plan of Pharaoh was not except in ruin.
trans-unit.target: Die maniere in die hemele - sodat ek kan kyk na die god van Moses;

trans-unit.source: And he who believed said, "O my people, follow me, I will guide you to the way of right conduct.
trans-unit.target: En hy wat geglo het, "O my volk, volg my, ek sal jou lei na die pad van reg verloop.

trans-unit.source: O my people, this worldly life is only [temporary] enjoyment, and indeed, the Hereafter - that is the home of [permanent] settlement.
trans-unit.target: O My volk, hierdie aardse lewe is slegs [tydelike] genot, en inderdaad, die Hiernamaals - dit is die tuiste van [permanente] nedersetting.

trans-unit.source: Whoever does an evil deed will not be recompensed except by the like thereof; but whoever does righteousness, whether male or female, while he is a believer - those will enter Paradise, being given provision therein without account.
trans-unit.target: Elkeen wat dit doen 'n bose daad sal nie vergeld nie, behalwe deur die hou daarvan;

trans-unit.source: And O my people, how is it that I invite you to salvation while you invite me to the Fire?
trans-unit.target: En my volk, hoe is dit dat ek nooi jou uit om redding terwyl jy my uit te nooi om die vuur?

trans-unit.source: You invite me to disbelieve in Allah and associate with Him that of which I have no knowledge, and I invite you to the Exalted in Might, the Perpetual Forgiver.
trans-unit.target: Jy nooi my om nie glo in Allah en assosieer met hom dat waarvan ek geen kennis, en ek nooi jou uit om die Almagtige, die Ewigdurende Vergewer.

trans-unit.source: Assuredly, that to which you invite me has no [response to a] supplication in this world or in the Hereafter; and indeed, our return is to Allah, and indeed, the transgressors will be companions of the Fire.
trans-unit.target: Voorwaar dat wat jy nooi my geen [reaksie op 'n] smeking in hierdie wêreld of in die Hiernamaals;

trans-unit.source: And you will remember what I [now] say to you, and I entrust my affair to Allah. Indeed, Allah is Seeing of [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: En jy sal onthou wat ek [nou] sê vir julle, en ek vertrou my saak aan Allah.

trans-unit.source: So Allah protected him from the evils they plotted, and the people of Pharaoh were enveloped by the worst of punishment -
trans-unit.target: So Allah beskerm hom van die euwels wat hulle getrek, en die mense van Farao was omring deur die ergste straf -

trans-unit.source: The Fire, they are exposed to it morning and evening. And the Day the Hour appears [it will be said], "Make the people of Pharaoh enter the severest punishment."
trans-unit.target: Die vuur word hulle blootgestel aan dit oggend en aand.

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when they will argue within the Fire, and the weak will say to those who had been arrogant, "Indeed, we were [only] your followers, so will you relieve us of a share of the Fire?"
trans-unit.target: En [melding] wanneer hulle binne die Vuur sal argumenteer, en die swak sal sê aan diegene wat arrogant was, "Inderdaad, was ons [net] jou volgelinge, so sal u ons te verlig van 'n deel van die vuur?"

trans-unit.source: Those who had been arrogant will say, "Indeed, all [of us] are in it. Indeed, Allah has judged between the servants."
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat arrogant was sal sê: "Inderdaad, al [ons] in dit. Voorwaar, Allah het geoordeel tussen die dienaars."

trans-unit.source: And those in the Fire will say to the keepers of Hell, "Supplicate your Lord to lighten for us a day from the punishment."
trans-unit.target: En diegene in die vuur sal hulle vir die bewaarders van die hel, "smeek jou Here te verlig vir ons 'n dag van die straf."

trans-unit.source: They will say, "Did there not come to you your messengers with clear proofs?" They will say, "Yes." They will reply, "Then supplicate [yourselves], but the supplication of the disbelievers is not except in error."
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal sê: "Het daar nie na jou toe kom jou boodskappers met duidelike tekens?"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We will support Our messengers and those who believe during the life of this world and on the Day when the witnesses will stand -
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal Ons ondersteun ons boodskappers en diegene wat glo tydens die lewe van hierdie wêreld en op die dag wanneer die getuies sal staan -

trans-unit.source: The Day their excuse will not benefit the wrongdoers, and they will have the curse, and they will have the worst home.
trans-unit.target: Die Dag hul verskoning sal nie tot voordeel van die oortreders, en hulle sal die vloek het, en hulle sal die ergste huis het.

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Moses guidance, and We caused the Children of Israel to inherit the Scripture
trans-unit.target: En ons het beslis gegee Moses leiding en Ons het veroorsaak dat die kinders van Israel aan die Skrif erf

trans-unit.source: As guidance and a reminder for those of understanding.
trans-unit.target: Soos leiding en herinnering vir diegene van begrip.

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]. Indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And ask forgiveness for your sin and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord in the evening and the morning.
trans-unit.target: So wees geduldig, [O Muhammad].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah without [any] authority having come to them - there is not within their breasts except pride, [the extent of] which they cannot reach. So seek refuge in Allah. Indeed, it is He who is the Hearing, the Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat geskil oor die tekens van Allah sonder [enige] gesag het by hulle gekom nie - daar is nie in hul borste behalwe trots, [die omvang van] wat hulle nie kan bereik.

trans-unit.source: The creation of the heavens and earth is greater than the creation of mankind, but most of the people do not know.
trans-unit.target: Die skepping van die hemel en die aarde is groter as die skepping van die mens, maar die meeste van die mense weet nie.

trans-unit.source: And not equal are the blind and the seeing, nor are those who believe and do righteous deeds and the evildoer. Little do you remember.
trans-unit.target: En nie gelyk is blindes en sien nie, is dié wat glo en goeie werke doen en die kwaaddoener.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - but most of the people do not believe.
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die uur kom - geen twyfel daaroor nie - maar die meeste van die mense glo nie.

trans-unit.source: And your Lord says, "Call upon Me; I will respond to you." Indeed, those who disdain My worship will enter Hell [rendered] contemptible.
trans-unit.target: En jou Here sê, "My aanroep; ek sal reageer op jou."

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the night that you may rest therein and the day giving sight. Indeed, Allah is full of bounty to the people, but most of the people are not grateful.
trans-unit.target: Dit is Allah wat vir julle die aand wat jy daarin kan woon en die dag wat die oog.

trans-unit.source: That is Allah, your Lord, Creator of all things; there is no deity except Him, so how are you deluded?
trans-unit.target: Dit is Allah, jou God, Skepper van alle dinge;

trans-unit.source: Thus were those [before you] deluded who were rejecting the signs of Allah.
trans-unit.target: So was die [voordat jy] mislei wat die tekens van Allah is verwerp.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the earth a place of settlement and the sky a ceiling and formed you and perfected your forms and provided you with good things. That is Allah, your Lord; then blessed is Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Dit is Allah wat vir julle die aarde 'n plek van vestiging en die lug 'n plafon en jy gevorm en vervolmaak jou vorms en op voorwaarde dat jy met goeie dinge.

trans-unit.source: He is the Ever-Living; there is no deity except Him, so call upon Him, [being] sincere to Him in religion. [All] praise is [due] to Allah, Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: Hy is die lewende;

trans-unit.source: Say, [O Muhammad], "Indeed, I have been forbidden to worship those you call upon besides Allah once the clear proofs have come to me from my Lord, and I have been commanded to submit to the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Sê [O Muhammad], "Inderdaad, ek is verbied om diegene wat jy aanroep behalwe Allah sodra die duidelike tekens van my Here na my toe gekom het, te aanbid en ek beveel is om die Here van die wêrelde in te dien."

trans-unit.source: It is He who created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot; then He brings you out as a child; then [He develops you] that you reach your [time of] maturity, then [further] that you become elders. And among you is he who is taken in death before [that], so that you reach a specified term; and perhaps you will use reason.
trans-unit.target: Dit is Hy wat julle uit stof geskep, dan van 'n lewe kiem, dan van 'n vasklou klont;

trans-unit.source: He it is who gives life and causes death; and when He decrees a matter, He but says to it, "Be," and it is.
trans-unit.target: Hy is dit wat die lewe gee en veroorsaak die dood;

trans-unit.source: Do you not consider those who dispute concerning the signs of Allah - how are they averted?
trans-unit.target: Het jy nie oorweeg om diegene wat geskil oor die tekens van Allah - hoe word dit afgeweer?

trans-unit.source: Those who deny the Book and that with which We sent Our messengers - they are going to know,
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat die boek en dit waarmee ons gestuur Ons boodskappers ontken - hulle gaan om te weet,

trans-unit.source: When the shackles are around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die boeie is om hul nekke en die kettings;

trans-unit.source: In boiling water; then in the Fire they will be filled [with flame].
trans-unit.target: In kookwater;

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said to them, "Where is that which you used to associate [with Him in worship]
trans-unit.target: Dan sal dit vir hulle gesê: "Waar is dit wat jy gebruik om te assosieer [met Hom in aanbidding]

trans-unit.source: Other than Allah?" They will say, "They have departed from us; rather, we did not used to invoke previously anything." Thus does Allah put astray the disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: ? Behalwe Allah "Hulle sal sê:" Hulle het vertrek van ons af;

trans-unit.source: [The angels will say], "That was because you used to exult upon the earth without right and you used to behave insolently.
trans-unit.target: [Die engele sal sê]: "Dit was nie omdat jy gebruik om jubel oor die aarde sonder reg en jy gebruik om onbeskaamd te tree.

trans-unit.source: Enter the gates of Hell to abide eternally therein, and wretched is the residence of the arrogant."
trans-unit.target: Tik die hekke van die hel tot in ewigheid daarin bly, en ellendig is die woning van die arrogante. "

trans-unit.source: So be patient, [O Muhammad]; indeed, the promise of Allah is truth. And whether We show you some of what We have promised them or We take you in death, it is to Us they will be returned.
trans-unit.target: So wees geduldig, [O Muhammad];

trans-unit.source: And We have already sent messengers before you. Among them are those [whose stories] We have related to you, and among them are those [whose stories] We have not related to you. And it was not for any messenger to bring a sign [or verse] except by permission of Allah. So when the command of Allah comes, it will be concluded in truth, and the falsifiers will thereupon lose [all].
trans-unit.target: En Ons het reeds het boodskappers uitgestuur voor jou.

trans-unit.source: It is Allah who made for you the grazing animals upon which you ride, and some of them you eat.
trans-unit.target: Dit is Allah wat vir julle die weiding diere waarop jy ry, en sommige van hulle wat jy eet.

trans-unit.source: And for you therein are [other] benefits and that you may realize upon them a need which is in your breasts; and upon them and upon ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: En vir jou daarin is [ander] voordele en wat jy kan besef op hulle 'n behoefte wat in jou borste;

trans-unit.source: And He shows you His signs. So which of the signs of Allah do you deny?
trans-unit.target: En Hy wys jou sy tekens.

trans-unit.source: Have they not traveled through the land and observed how was the end of those before them? They were more numerous than themselves and greater in strength and in impression on the land, but they were not availed by what they used to earn.
trans-unit.target: Het hulle nie deur die land en waargeneem hoe was die einde van die voor hulle uit?

trans-unit.source: And when their messengers came to them with clear proofs, they [merely] rejoiced in what they had of knowledge, but they were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: En toe hulle boodskappers het na hulle gekom met duidelike tekens, hulle [bloot] verheug in wat hulle gehad het aan kennis, maar hulle is omring deur wat hulle gebruik om bespotting.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw Our punishment, they said," We believe in Allah alone and disbelieve in that which we used to associate with Him."
trans-unit.target: En toe hulle sien ons straf, sê hulle: "Ons glo in Allah alleen en verwerp dit wat ons gebruik om te assosieer met hom."

trans-unit.source: But never did their faith benefit them once they saw Our punishment. [It is] the established way of Allah which has preceded among His servants. And the disbelievers thereupon lost [all].
trans-unit.target: Maar nooit het hulle geloof tot voordeel van hulle nadat hulle gesien het Ons straf.

trans-unit.source: Ha, Meem.
trans-unit.target: Ha, Meem.

trans-unit.source: [This is] a revelation from the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful -
trans-unit.target: [Dit is] 'n openbaring van die Heeltemal Barmhartige, die Genadige Veral -

trans-unit.source: A Book whose verses have been detailed, an Arabic Qur'an for a people who know,
trans-unit.target: 'N Boek waarvan die verse is uiteengesit, 'n Arabiese Koran vir 'n volk wat weet,

trans-unit.source: As a giver of good tidings and a warner; but most of them turn away, so they do not hear.
trans-unit.target: As 'n gewer van goeie boodskap en 'n Warner;

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Our hearts are within coverings from that to which you invite us, and in our ears is deafness, and between us and you is a partition, so work; indeed, we are working."
trans-unit.target: En hulle sê: "Ons harte is binne bedekkings van dié waaraan jy ons nooi, en in ons ore is doof, en tussen ons en julle 'n partisie, so werk, ja, ons is besig."

trans-unit.source: Say, O [Muhammad], "I am only a man like you to whom it has been revealed that your god is but one God; so take a straight course to Him and seek His forgiveness." And woe to those who associate others with Allah -
trans-unit.target: En sê: o [Muhammad]: "Ek is net 'n mens soos jy aan wie dit aan die lig gebring dat julle God is maar een God, sodat neem 'n reguit koers gehou na Hom en vra Hom om vergifnis."

trans-unit.source: Those who do not give zakah, and in the Hereafter they are disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat nie Zakah hoef te gee, en in die Hiernamaals hulle ongelowiges.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen - vir hulle is 'n beloning ononderbroke.

trans-unit.source: Say, "Do you indeed disbelieve in He who created the earth in two days and attribute to Him equals? That is the Lord of the worlds."
trans-unit.target: Sê, "Het jy wel glo in Wie die aarde in twee dae geskep en toe te skryf aan Hom gelyk? Dit is die Here van die wêrelde."

trans-unit.source: And He placed on the earth firmly set mountains over its surface, and He blessed it and determined therein its [creatures'] sustenance in four days without distinction - for [the information] of those who ask.
trans-unit.target: En Hy wat op die aarde stewig berge oor die oppervlak, en Hy seën dit en bepaal daarin sy [wesens '] lewensmiddele in vier dae sonder onderskeid - vir [die inligting] van diegene wat vra.

trans-unit.source: Then He directed Himself to the heaven while it was smoke and said to it and to the earth, "Come [into being], willingly or by compulsion." They said, "We have come willingly."
trans-unit.target: Dan gerig Hy Homself aan die hemel terwyl dit rook en sê vir hom en vir die aarde: "Kom [in die lewe geroep], gewillig of deur dwang."

trans-unit.source: And He completed them as seven heavens within two days and inspired in each heaven its command. And We adorned the nearest heaven with lamps and as protection. That is the determination of the Exalted in Might, the Knowing.
trans-unit.target: En Hy het hulle as sewe hemele binne twee dae en geïnspireer in elk hemel sy opdrag.

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have warned you of a thunderbolt like the thunderbolt [that struck] 'Aad and Thamud.
trans-unit.target: Maar as hulle afwend, dan sê, "Ek het jou gewaarsku van 'n donderslag soos die weerlig 'Aad en Samoed [wat getref].

trans-unit.source: [That occurred] when the messengers had come to them before them and after them, [saying], "Worship not except Allah." They said, "If our Lord had willed, He would have sent down the angels, so indeed we, in that with which you have been sent, are disbelievers."
trans-unit.target: [Wat plaasgevind het] Toe die boodskappers voor hulle vir hul saamgeneem het gekom en agter hulle aan, [sê], "aanbidding nie, behalwe Allah."

trans-unit.source: As for 'Aad, they were arrogant upon the earth without right and said, "Who is greater than us in strength?" Did they not consider that Allah who created them was greater than them in strength? But they were rejecting Our signs.
