trans-unit.source: About the great news -
trans-unit.target: Oor die goeie nuus -

trans-unit.source: That over which they are in disagreement.
trans-unit.target: Dit waaroor hulle in onenigheid.

trans-unit.source: No! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Then, no! They are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Dan, nee!

trans-unit.source: Have We not made the earth a resting place?
trans-unit.target: Ons het nie het die aarde 'n rusplek?

trans-unit.source: And the mountains as stakes?
trans-unit.target: En die berge soos spel?

trans-unit.source: And We created you in pairs
trans-unit.target: En ons het jou in pare

trans-unit.source: And made your sleep [a means for] rest
trans-unit.target: En het jou slaap [ 'n middel vir] res

trans-unit.source: And made the night as clothing
trans-unit.target: En hy het die nag as klere

trans-unit.source: And made the day for livelihood
trans-unit.target: En hy het die dag vir lewensbestaan

trans-unit.source: And constructed above you seven strong [heavens]
trans-unit.target: En opgerig is bo jou sewe sterk [hemel]

trans-unit.source: And made [therein] a burning lamp
trans-unit.target: En het [daarin] 'n brandende lamp

trans-unit.source: And sent down, from the rain clouds, pouring water
trans-unit.target: En toe gestuur, uit die reënwolke, giet water

trans-unit.source: That We may bring forth thereby grain and vegetation
trans-unit.target: Sodat ons kan voortbring daardeur graan en plantegroei

trans-unit.source: And gardens of entwined growth.
trans-unit.target: En tuine van verweef groei.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Day of Judgement is an appointed time -
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die dag van die opstanding is 'n vasgestelde tyd -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn is blown and you will come forth in multitudes
trans-unit.target: Die Dag van die horing geblaas en jy sal weer in 'n skare

trans-unit.source: And the heaven is opened and will become gateways
trans-unit.target: En die hemel is geopen en sal poorte geword

trans-unit.source: And the mountains are removed and will be [but] a mirage.
trans-unit.target: En die berge is verwyder en sal wees [maar] 'n lugspieëling.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hell has been lying in wait
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, het die hel is hinderlaag

trans-unit.source: For the transgressors, a place of return,
trans-unit.target: Vir die oortreders, 'n plek van terugkeer,

trans-unit.source: In which they will remain for ages [unending].
trans-unit.target: Waarin hulle sal vir eeue [oneindige] bly.

trans-unit.source: They will not taste therein [any] coolness or drink
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal nie smaak daarin [enige] koelte of drank

trans-unit.source: Except scalding water and [foul] purulence -
trans-unit.target: Behalwe kokend water en [vieslike] etteren -

trans-unit.source: An appropriate recompense.
trans-unit.target: 'N Gepaste vergelding.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they were not expecting an account
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, is hulle nie verwag 'n rekening

trans-unit.source: And denied Our verses with [emphatic] denial.
trans-unit.target: En ontken Ons verse met [empatiese] ontkenning.

trans-unit.source: But all things We have enumerated in writing.
trans-unit.target: Maar alles Ons skriftelik vervat.

trans-unit.source: "So taste [the penalty], and never will We increase you except in torment."
trans-unit.target: "So smaak [die straf], en nooit sal Ons verhoog jy behalwe in foltering."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, for the righteous is attainment -
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, vir die regverdige is bereiking -

trans-unit.source: Gardens and grapevines
trans-unit.target: Tuine en wingerdstokke

trans-unit.source: And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
trans-unit.target: En full-breasted [metgeselle] van gelyke ouderdom

trans-unit.source: And a full cup.
trans-unit.target: En 'n volle beker.

trans-unit.source: No ill speech will they hear therein or any falsehood -
trans-unit.target: Geen siek toespraak sal hulle hoor daarin of enige bedrog -

trans-unit.source: [As] reward from your Lord, [a generous] gift [made due by] account,
trans-unit.target: [As] beloning van jou God, [ 'n ruim] geskenk [gemaak as gevolg van] rekening,

trans-unit.source: [From] the Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatever is between them, the Most Merciful. They possess not from Him [authority for] speech.
trans-unit.target: [Van] die Here van die hemel en die aarde en alles wat daar tussen is, die Genadigste.

trans-unit.source: The Day that the Spirit and the angels will stand in rows, they will not speak except for one whom the Most Merciful permits, and he will say what is correct.
trans-unit.target: Die dag toe die Gees en die engele in rye staan, sal hulle nie, behalwe vir een wie die meeste Barmhartige permitte praat, en hy sal sê wat reg is.

trans-unit.source: That is the True Day; so he who wills may take to his Lord a [way of] return.
trans-unit.target: Dit is die ware dag;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have warned you of a near punishment on the Day when a man will observe what his hands have put forth and the disbeliever will say, "Oh, I wish that I were dust!"
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, het ons jou gewaarsku van 'n naby straf op die Dag wanneer 'n mens sal sien wat sy hande gesit en die ongelowige sal sê: "O, ek wens dat ek stof!"

trans-unit.source: By those [angels] who extract with violence
trans-unit.target: Deur die [engele] wat onttrek met 'n vaart

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who remove with ease
trans-unit.target: En [deur] diegene wat verwyder met gemak

trans-unit.source: And [by] those who glide [as if] swimming
trans-unit.target: En [deur] diegene wat gly [asof] swem

trans-unit.source: And those who race each other in a race
trans-unit.target: En diegene wat mekaar jaag in 'n wedloop

trans-unit.source: And those who arrange [each] matter,
trans-unit.target: En diegene wat reël [elke] saak,

trans-unit.source: On the Day the blast [of the Horn] will convulse [creation],
trans-unit.target: Op die dag waarop die ontploffing [van die horing] sal [skepping] stuip,

trans-unit.source: There will follow it the subsequent [one].
trans-unit.target: Daar sal dit die daaropvolgende [een] volg.

trans-unit.source: Hearts, that Day, will tremble,
trans-unit.target: Harte op die Dag sal bewe,

trans-unit.source: Their eyes humbled.
trans-unit.target: Hul oë verneder.

trans-unit.source: They are [presently] saying, "Will we indeed be returned to [our] former state [of life]?
trans-unit.target: Hulle [tans] sê: "Sal ons wel teruggestuur word aan [ons] voormalige staat [lewe]?

trans-unit.source: Even if we should be decayed bones?
trans-unit.target: Selfs as ons moet verval bene?

trans-unit.source: They say, "That, then, would be a losing return."
trans-unit.target: Hulle sê, "Dit is dan sou 'n verlies van terugkeer nie."

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it will be but one shout,
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal dit wees, maar een skree,

trans-unit.source: And suddenly they will be [alert] upon the earth's surface.
trans-unit.target: En skielik sal hulle [waarskuwing] op die aarde se oppervlak wees.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of Moses? -
trans-unit.target: Het daar die verhaal van Moses bereik jy?

trans-unit.source: When his Lord called to him in the sacred valley of Tuwa,
trans-unit.target: Toe sy Here geroep om hom in die heilige vallei van Tuwa,

trans-unit.source: "Go to Pharaoh. Indeed, he has transgressed.
trans-unit.target: "Gaan na Farao. Inderdaad, het hy oortree.

trans-unit.source: And say to him, 'Would you [be willing to] purify yourself
trans-unit.target: En sê vir hom: Wil jy [bereid wees om] reinig jouself

trans-unit.source: And let me guide you to your Lord so you would fear [Him]?'"
trans-unit.target: En laat ek jou help om jou Here, sodat jy sou vrees [hom]? ""

trans-unit.source: And he showed him the greatest sign,
trans-unit.target: En toe hy hom die grootste teken,

trans-unit.source: But Pharaoh denied and disobeyed.
trans-unit.target: Maar Farao geweier en ongehoorsaam.

trans-unit.source: Then he turned his back, striving.
trans-unit.target: Toe draai hy sy rug en stry.

trans-unit.source: And he gathered [his people] and called out
trans-unit.target: Daarop vergader hy [sy mense] en uitgeroep

trans-unit.source: And said, "I am your most exalted lord."
trans-unit.target: En gesê: "Ek is jou mees verhewe Heer."

trans-unit.source: So Allah seized him in exemplary punishment for the last and the first [transgression].
trans-unit.target: So gryp Allah hom op voorbeeldige straf vir die laaste en die eerste [oortreding].

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that is a warning for whoever would fear [Allah].
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad in wat 'n waarskuwing vir elkeen [Allah] te vrees.

trans-unit.source: Are you a more difficult creation or is the heaven? Allah constructed it.
trans-unit.target: Is jy 'n moeiliker skepping of is die hemel?

trans-unit.source: He raised its ceiling and proportioned it.
trans-unit.target: Hy opgewek sy plafon en verhouding nie.

trans-unit.source: And He darkened its night and extracted its brightness.
trans-unit.target: En Hy verduister die nag en onttrek sy helderheid.

trans-unit.source: And after that He spread the earth.
trans-unit.target: En daarna sal hy versprei die aarde.

trans-unit.source: He extracted from it its water and its pasture,
trans-unit.target: Hy onttrek uit dit sy water en sy weiveld,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains He set firmly
trans-unit.target: En die berge Hy stel vas

trans-unit.source: As provision for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: Voorsiening vir jou en jou weiding vee.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the greatest Overwhelming Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Maar toe kom daar die grootste Oorweldigende ONGELUK -

trans-unit.source: The Day when man will remember that for which he strove,
trans-unit.target: Die dag toe die mens sal onthou dat hy waarvoor getwis,

trans-unit.source: And Hellfire will be exposed for [all] those who see -
trans-unit.target: En Hellfire blootgestel sal word vir [al] diegene wat sien -

trans-unit.source: So as for he who transgressed
trans-unit.target: So as vir wie oortree

trans-unit.source: And preferred the life of the world,
trans-unit.target: En verkies om die lewe van die wêreld,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Hellfire will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Dan inderdaad, sal Hellfire wees [sy] toevlug.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who feared the position of his Lord and prevented the soul from [unlawful] inclination,
trans-unit.target: Maar as vir wie die posisie van die Here gevrees en verhoed dat die siel van [onwettige] geneigdheid,

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, Paradise will be [his] refuge.
trans-unit.target: Dan inderdaad, sal die Paradys wees [sy] toevlug.

trans-unit.source: They ask you, [O Muhammad], about the Hour: when is its arrival?
trans-unit.target: Hulle vra jou, [O Muhammad], oor die Uur: wanneer is sy aankoms?

trans-unit.source: In what [position] are you that you should mention it?
trans-unit.target: In watter [posisie] is dat jy dit moet noem?

trans-unit.source: To your Lord is its finality.
trans-unit.target: Om jou Here is sy finaliteit.

trans-unit.source: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
trans-unit.target: Jy is net 'n Warner vir diegene wat dit vrees.

trans-unit.source: It will be, on the Day they see it, as though they had not remained [in the world] except for an afternoon or a morning thereof.
trans-unit.target: Dit sal wees op die dag toe hulle dit sien, asof hulle nooit bestaan [in die wêreld] gebly, behalwe vir 'n middag of 'n oggend daarvan.

trans-unit.source: The Prophet frowned and turned away
trans-unit.target: Die profeet frons en weggewys

trans-unit.source: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].
trans-unit.target: Omdat daar na Hom gekom toe die blinde, [onderbreking].

trans-unit.source: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified
trans-unit.target: Maar wat sal maak dat jy sien, [O Muhammad], wat miskien is hy dalk gesuiwer

trans-unit.source: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?
trans-unit.target: Of herinner word en die gedagtenis sal hom baat?

trans-unit.source: As for he who thinks himself without need,
trans-unit.target: Soos vir wie meen dat hy sonder die behoefte,

trans-unit.source: To him you give attention.
trans-unit.target: Aan hom wat jy aandag gee.

trans-unit.source: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.
trans-unit.target: En nie oor julle [is geen blaam] as hy nie sal gesuiwer word.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]
trans-unit.target: Maar as want hy wat tot julle gekom strewe [na kennis]

trans-unit.source: While he fears [Allah],
trans-unit.target: Terwyl hy vrees [Allah],

trans-unit.source: From him you are distracted.
trans-unit.target: Van hom jy afgelei.

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: So whoever wills may remember it.
trans-unit.target: So wie wil kan dit onthou.

trans-unit.source: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,
trans-unit.target: [Dit word op rekord] in vereer velle,

trans-unit.source: Exalted and purified,
trans-unit.target: Verhef en gesuiwer,

trans-unit.source: [Carried] by the hands of messenger-angels,
trans-unit.target: [Uitgevoer] deur die hande van boodskapper-engele,

trans-unit.source: Noble and dutiful.
trans-unit.target: Noble en pligsgetrou.

trans-unit.source: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.
trans-unit.target: Vervloek is die mens;

trans-unit.source: From what substance did He create him?
trans-unit.target: Van watter stof het Hy hom te skep?

trans-unit.source: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;
trans-unit.target: Van 'n lewe kiem Hy hom geskape en bestem vir hom;

trans-unit.source: Then He eased the way for him;
trans-unit.target: Dan verlig hy die weg vir hom;

trans-unit.source: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.
trans-unit.target: Dan veroorsaak Hy sy dood en bied 'n graf vir hom.

trans-unit.source: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.
trans-unit.target: Dan wanneer Hy wil, sal Hy hom op te wek.

trans-unit.source: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Then let mankind look at his food -
trans-unit.target: Dan moet mens kyk na sy kos -

trans-unit.source: How We poured down water in torrents,
trans-unit.target: Hoe Ons uitgestort af water in strome,

trans-unit.source: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],
trans-unit.target: Toe Ons oopgebreek die aarde, breek [dit met spruite],

trans-unit.source: And caused to grow within it grain
trans-unit.target: En laat groei daarin graan

trans-unit.source: And grapes and herbage
trans-unit.target: En druiwe en gras

trans-unit.source: And olive and palm trees
trans-unit.target: En olyf en palmbome

trans-unit.source: And gardens of dense shrubbery
trans-unit.target: En tuine van digte struike

trans-unit.source: And fruit and grass -
trans-unit.target: En vrugte en gras -

trans-unit.source: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.
trans-unit.target: [As] genot vir jou en jou weiding vee.

trans-unit.source: But when there comes the Deafening Blast
trans-unit.target: Maar toe kom daar die oorverdowend ontploffing

trans-unit.source: On the Day a man will flee from his brother
trans-unit.target: Op die dag sal 'n man vlug van sy broer

trans-unit.source: And his mother and his father
trans-unit.target: En sy moeder en sy vader

trans-unit.source: And his wife and his children,
trans-unit.target: En sy vrou en sy kinders,

trans-unit.source: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.
trans-unit.target: Vir elke persoon, dit Day, sal 'n saak wat voldoende is vir hom wees.

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright -
trans-unit.target: [Sommige] gesigte op die Dag sal helder -

trans-unit.source: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.
trans-unit.target: Lag, blydskap by goeie nuus.

trans-unit.source: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.
trans-unit.target: En [ander] gesigte op die Dag op hulle sal hê stof.

trans-unit.source: Blackness will cover them.
trans-unit.target: Swartheid sal hulle oordek.

trans-unit.source: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
trans-unit.target: Dit is die ongelowiges, die slegte dinge gewend.

trans-unit.source: When the sun is wrapped up [in darkness]
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die son toegedraai [in duisternis]

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, dispersing,
trans-unit.target: En toe die sterre val, verspreiding,

trans-unit.source: And when the mountains are removed
trans-unit.target: En toe die berge verwyder

trans-unit.source: And when full-term she-camels are neglected
trans-unit.target: En toe vol termyn kamele verwaarloos

trans-unit.source: And when the wild beasts are gathered
trans-unit.target: En toe die wilde diere versamel

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are filled with flame
trans-unit.target: En toe die see is gevul met 'n vlam

trans-unit.source: And when the souls are paired
trans-unit.target: En toe die siele gepaar

trans-unit.source: And when the girl [who was] buried alive is asked
trans-unit.target: En toe die meisie [wat was] lewendig begrawe is gevra

trans-unit.source: For what sin she was killed
trans-unit.target: Want wat die sonde was sy vermoor

trans-unit.source: And when the pages are made public
trans-unit.target: En toe die bladsye openbaar gemaak

trans-unit.source: And when the sky is stripped away
trans-unit.target: En toe die hemel is gestroop weg

trans-unit.source: And when Hellfire is set ablaze
trans-unit.target: En toe Hellfire gestel aan die brand

trans-unit.source: And when Paradise is brought near,
trans-unit.target: En toe die Paradys is naby gebring,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has brought [with it].
trans-unit.target: 'N siel sal [dan] weet wat dit [daarmee] gebring.

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the retreating stars -
trans-unit.target: So ek sweer by die aftog blaas sterre -

trans-unit.source: Those that run [their courses] and disappear -
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat [hul kursusse] hardloop en verdwyn -

trans-unit.source: And by the night as it closes in
trans-unit.target: En deur die nag as dit sluit in

trans-unit.source: And by the dawn when it breathes
trans-unit.target: En deur die aanbreek wanneer dit asemhaal

trans-unit.source: [That] indeed, the Qur'an is a word [conveyed by] a noble messenger
trans-unit.target: [Dit] Trouens, die Koran is 'n woord [oorgedra deur] 'n edele boodskapper

trans-unit.source: [Who is] possessed of power and with the Owner of the Throne, secure [in position],
trans-unit.target: [Wie is] in besit van krag en met die eienaar van die troon af, te beveilig [in posisie],

trans-unit.source: Obeyed there [in the heavens] and trustworthy.
trans-unit.target: Gehoorsaam daar [in die hemel] en betroubaar.

trans-unit.source: And your companion is not [at all] mad.
trans-unit.target: En jou metgesel is nie [glad] mal.

trans-unit.source: And he has already seen Gabriel in the clear horizon.
trans-unit.target: En hy het reeds Gabriel gesien in die helder horison.

trans-unit.source: And Muhammad is not a withholder of [knowledge of] the unseen.
trans-unit.target: En Mohammed is nie 'n teëhouer van [kennis van] die onsigbare.

trans-unit.source: And the Qur'an is not the word of a devil, expelled [from the heavens].
trans-unit.target: En die Koran is nie die woord van 'n duiwel, geskors [uit die hemel].

trans-unit.source: So where are you going?
trans-unit.target: So waar gaan jy heen?

trans-unit.source: It is not except a reminder to the worlds
trans-unit.target: Dit is nie 'n herinnering aan die wêreld, behalwe

trans-unit.source: For whoever wills among you to take a right course.
trans-unit.target: Want elkeen wat wil onder julle 'n regte kursus te neem.

trans-unit.source: And you do not will except that Allah wills - Lord of the worlds.
trans-unit.target: En jy hoef nie sal aanvaar dat Allah wil - Lord of the wêrelde.

trans-unit.source: When the sky breaks apart
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die lug breek uitmekaar

trans-unit.source: And when the stars fall, scattering,
trans-unit.target: En toe die sterre val, verstrooiing,

trans-unit.source: And when the seas are erupted
trans-unit.target: En toe die see is losgebars

trans-unit.source: And when the [contents of] graves are scattered,
trans-unit.target: En toe die [inhoud van] grafte gestrooi,

trans-unit.source: A soul will [then] know what it has put forth and kept back.
trans-unit.target: 'N siel sal [dan] weet wat dit uitgebring het sit en gehou terug.

trans-unit.source: O mankind, what has deceived you concerning your Lord, the Generous,
trans-unit.target: O mensdom, wat mislei jy met betrekking tot jou Here, die ruim,

trans-unit.source: Who created you, proportioned you, and balanced you?
trans-unit.target: Jou Skepper, verhouding wat jy en gebalanseer jy?

trans-unit.source: In whatever form He willed has He assembled you.
trans-unit.target: In watter vorm Hy wou het Hy vergader jy.

trans-unit.source: No! But you deny the Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And indeed, [appointed] over you are keepers,
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, [aangestel] oor julle wagte,

trans-unit.source: Noble and recording;
trans-unit.target: Noble en opname;

trans-unit.source: They know whatever you do.
trans-unit.target: Hulle weet alles wat jy doen.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure,
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die regverdige sal in plesier,

trans-unit.source: And indeed, the wicked will be in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, die goddelose sal in Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn therein on the Day of Recompense,
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal [betree om] daarin verbrand op die Dag van vergelding,

trans-unit.source: And never therefrom will they be absent.
trans-unit.target: En nooit daaruit sal hulle afwesig is.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die Dag van die Oordeels?

trans-unit.source: Then, what can make you know what is the Day of Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Dan, wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die Dag van die Oordeels?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when a soul will not possess for another soul [power to do] a thing; and the command, that Day, is [entirely] with Allah.
trans-unit.target: Dit is die dag wanneer 'n siel nie sal besit vir 'n ander siel [krag om te doen] 'n ding;

trans-unit.source: Woe to those who give less [than due],
trans-unit.target: Wee hulle wat minder [as gevolg] gee,

trans-unit.source: Who, when they take a measure from people, take in full.
trans-unit.target: Húlle 'n maatstaf te neem van mense, neem ten volle.

trans-unit.source: But if they give by measure or by weight to them, they cause loss.
trans-unit.target: Maar as hulle nie met mate nie of by die gewig teruggee vir hulle veroorsaak hulle verlies.

trans-unit.source: Do they not think that they will be resurrected
trans-unit.target: Moet hulle nie dink dat hulle sal opstaan

trans-unit.source: For a tremendous Day -
trans-unit.target: Vir 'n geweldige Dag -

trans-unit.source: The Day when mankind will stand before the Lord of the worlds?
trans-unit.target: Die dag toe die mensdom voor die Here van die wêrelde sal staan?

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the wicked is in sijjeen.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is sijjeen?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is sijjeen?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed.
trans-unit.target: Dit is [hul bestemming aangeteken in] 'n register geskrywe.

trans-unit.source: Woe, that Day, to the deniers,
trans-unit.target: Wee op die Dag van die deniers,

trans-unit.source: Who deny the Day of Recompense.
trans-unit.target: Wat ontken die Dag van die Oordeels.

trans-unit.source: And none deny it except every sinful transgressor.
trans-unit.target: En niemand ontken nie, behalwe elke sondige oortreder.

trans-unit.source: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, "Legends of the former peoples."
trans-unit.target: Wanneer ons verse word opgesê vir hom, sê hy, "Legendes van die voormalige mense."

trans-unit.source: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Day, they will be partitioned.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, they will [enter and] burn in Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Dan inderdaad, sal hulle [betree en] brand in Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then it will be said [to them], "This is what you used to deny."
trans-unit.target: Dan sal dit gesê word [vir hulle], "Dit is wat jy gebruik om te ontken."

trans-unit.source: No! Indeed, the record of the righteous is in 'illiyyun.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is 'illiyyun?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat 'illiyyun?

trans-unit.source: It is [their destination recorded in] a register inscribed
trans-unit.target: Dit is [hul bestemming aangeteken in] 'n register ingeskrewe

trans-unit.source: Which is witnessed by those brought near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Wat getuig diegene naby [Allah] gebring.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the righteous will be in pleasure
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die regverdige sal in plesier

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Op versier rusbanke, die waarneming van.

trans-unit.source: You will recognize in their faces the radiance of pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Jy sal erken in hul gesigte die glans van plesier.

trans-unit.source: They will be given to drink [pure] wine [which was] sealed.
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal gegee om te drink [suiwer] wyn [wat] verseël.

trans-unit.source: The last of it is musk. So for this let the competitors compete.
trans-unit.target: Die laaste van dit muskus.

trans-unit.source: And its mixture is of Tasneem,
trans-unit.target: En sy mengsel van Tasneem,

trans-unit.source: A spring from which those near [to Allah] drink.
trans-unit.target: 'N Veer waaruit die nabye [Allah] drink.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who committed crimes used to laugh at those who believed.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat misdade gepleeg het wat gebruik word om te lag diegene wat geglo het.

trans-unit.source: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
trans-unit.target: En toe hulle by hulle verby, sou hulle spottend blik te ruil.

trans-unit.source: And when they returned to their people, they would return jesting.
trans-unit.target: En toe hulle teruggegaan na hul mense, sou hulle opgetrek terug.

trans-unit.source: And when they saw them, they would say, "Indeed, those are truly lost."
trans-unit.target: En toe hulle dit gesien het, sal hulle sê: "Inderdaad, dit is werklik verlore."

trans-unit.source: But they had not been sent as guardians over them.
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle het nie gestuur nie as voogde oor hulle.

trans-unit.source: So Today those who believed are laughing at the disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: So vandag diegene wat geglo lag by die ongelowiges,

trans-unit.source: On adorned couches, observing.
trans-unit.target: Op versier rusbanke, die waarneming van.

trans-unit.source: Have the disbelievers [not] been rewarded [this Day] for what they used to do?
trans-unit.target: Het die ongelowiges [nie] is beloon [hierdie dag] vir wat hulle gebruik om te doen?

trans-unit.source: When the sky has split [open]
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die lug het verdeel [oopmaak]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
trans-unit.target: En het gereageer op sy Here en is verplig [om dit te doen]

trans-unit.source: And when the earth has been extended
trans-unit.target: En toe die aarde is uitgebrei

trans-unit.source: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
trans-unit.target: En het buitentoe gedryf word dat daarin en laat vaar [dit]

trans-unit.source: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
trans-unit.target: En het gereageer op sy Here en is verplig [om dit te doen] -

trans-unit.source: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
trans-unit.target: O mensdom, inderdaad jy swaar kry in die rigting van jou Here met [groot] inspanning en sal dit kom.

trans-unit.source: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
trans-unit.target: Dan as vir wie sy rekord in sy regterhand,

trans-unit.source: He will be judged with an easy account
trans-unit.target: Hy sal geoordeel word met 'n maklike rekening

trans-unit.source: And return to his people in happiness.
trans-unit.target: En terug te keer na sy mense in geluk.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
trans-unit.target: Maar as vir wie sy rekord gegee agter sy rug,

trans-unit.source: He will cry out for destruction
trans-unit.target: Hy sal uitroep vir vernietiging

trans-unit.source: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
trans-unit.target: En [betree om] brand in 'n vlam.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, het hy [keer] was onder sy volk in geluk;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, het hy gedink dat hy nooit sou terugkeer [Allah].

trans-unit.source: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
trans-unit.target: Maar ja!

trans-unit.source: So I swear by the twilight glow
trans-unit.target: So ek sweer by die skemer gloei

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night and what it envelops
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die nag en wat dit omsluit

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die maan wanneer dit vol

trans-unit.source: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
trans-unit.target: [Dit] jy sal sekerlik staat ervaar nadat die staat.

trans-unit.source: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
trans-unit.target: So, wat is [die saak] met hulle [wat] hulle glo nie,

trans-unit.source: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
trans-unit.target: En toe die Koran is vir tree vir hulle, het hulle nie neerbuig [Allah]?

trans-unit.source: But those who have disbelieved deny,
trans-unit.target: Maar diegene wat nie geglo ontken,

trans-unit.source: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
trans-unit.target: En Allah is die meeste omdat jy weet van wat hulle by hulleself te hou.

trans-unit.source: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
trans-unit.target: So gee hulle die tyding aangaande 'n pynlike straf,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe vir diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen.

trans-unit.source: By the sky containing great stars
trans-unit.target: Deur die lug met groot sterre

trans-unit.source: And [by] the promised Day
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die beloofde Dag

trans-unit.source: And [by] the witness and what is witnessed,
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die getuie en wat getuig,

trans-unit.source: Cursed were the companions of the trench
trans-unit.target: Vervloek is die bewoners van die sloot

trans-unit.source: [Containing] the fire full of fuel,
trans-unit.target: [Bevat] die vuur vol brandstof,

trans-unit.source: When they were sitting near it
trans-unit.target: Wanneer hulle gesit het naby dit

trans-unit.source: And they, to what they were doing against the believers, were witnesses.
trans-unit.target: En hulle, om wat hulle doen teen die gelowiges, was getuies.

trans-unit.source: And they resented them not except because they believed in Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy,
trans-unit.target: En hulle verkwalik hulle nie, behalwe omdat hulle geglo het in Allah, die Almagtige, die lofwaardige,

trans-unit.source: To whom belongs the dominion of the heavens and the earth. And Allah, over all things, is Witness.
trans-unit.target: Aan wie behoort die koninkryk van die hemele en die aarde.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have tortured the believing men and believing women and then have not repented will have the punishment of Hell, and they will have the punishment of the Burning Fire.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat die gelowige manne en vroue het gemartel en dan nie berou sal die straf van die hel het, en hulle sal die straf van die brande.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and done righteous deeds will have gardens beneath which rivers flow. That is the great attainment.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, diegene wat geglo het en gedoen regverdige dade sal tuine waardeur riviere strome het.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the vengeance of your Lord is severe.
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die wraak van jou Here is ernstig.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is He who originates [creation] and repeats.
trans-unit.target: Inteendeel, dit is Hy wat [skepping] en herhaal sy oorsprong.

trans-unit.source: And He is the Forgiving, the Affectionate,
trans-unit.target: En Hy is die Gezind, die liefdevol,

trans-unit.source: Honorable Owner of the Throne,
trans-unit.target: Eerbare Eienaar van die troon af,

trans-unit.source: Effecter of what He intends.
trans-unit.target: Effecter van wat Hy wil.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the story of the soldiers -
trans-unit.target: Was daar bereik jy die storie van die soldate -

trans-unit.source: [Those of] Pharaoh and Thamud?
trans-unit.target: [Diegene van] Farao en Samoed?

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieve are in [persistent] denial,
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle wat nie glo in [aanhoudende] ontkenning,

trans-unit.source: While Allah encompasses them from behind.
trans-unit.target: Terwyl Allah sluit hulle van agter.

trans-unit.source: But this is an honored Qur'an
trans-unit.target: Maar dit is 'n eer Koran

trans-unit.source: [Inscribed] in a Preserved Slate.
trans-unit.target: [Geskryf] in 'n Bewaar Slate.

trans-unit.source: By the sky and the night comer -
trans-unit.target: Deur die lug en die nag hoek -

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the night comer?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die nag hoek?

trans-unit.source: It is the piercing star -
trans-unit.target: Dit is die piercing ster -

trans-unit.source: There is no soul but that it has over it a protector.
trans-unit.target: Daar is geen siel, maar dat dit meer as dit 'n beskermer.

trans-unit.source: So let man observe from what he was created.
trans-unit.target: So laat die mens waarneem as wat hy geskep het.

trans-unit.source: He was created from a fluid, ejected,
trans-unit.target: Hy is gemaak van 'n vloeistof, uitgeskiet,

trans-unit.source: Emerging from between the backbone and the ribs.
trans-unit.target: Na vore kom uit tussen die ruggraat en ribbes.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah, to return him [to life], is Able.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, Allah, om hom terug te keer [te lewe], in staat is.

trans-unit.source: The Day when secrets will be put on trial,
trans-unit.target: Die dag toe geheime verhoor sal word,

trans-unit.source: Then man will have no power or any helper.
trans-unit.target: Dan sal die mense nie mag of enige helper het.

trans-unit.source: By the sky which returns [rain]
trans-unit.target: Deur die lug wat terugkeer [reën]

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth which cracks open,
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die aarde wat krake oop,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, the Qur'an is a decisive statement,
trans-unit.target: Trouens, die Koran is 'n beslissende verklaring,

trans-unit.source: And it is not amusement.
trans-unit.target: En dit is nie vermaak.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, is hulle beplan om 'n plan,

trans-unit.source: But I am planning a plan.
trans-unit.target: Maar ek is van plan 'n plan.

trans-unit.source: So allow time for the disbelievers. Leave them awhile.
trans-unit.target: So laat tyd vir die ongelowiges.

trans-unit.source: Exalt the name of your Lord, the Most High,
trans-unit.target: Verhef die naam van jou God, die Allerhoogste,

trans-unit.source: Who created and proportioned
trans-unit.target: Wie geskep en verhoudings

trans-unit.source: And who destined and [then] guided
trans-unit.target: En wie bestem en [dan] gelei

trans-unit.source: And who brings out the pasture
trans-unit.target: En wie bring die weiding

trans-unit.source: And [then] makes it black stubble.
trans-unit.target: En [dan] maak dit swart stoppels.

trans-unit.source: We will make you recite, [O Muhammad], and you will not forget,
trans-unit.target: Ons sal jou laat opsê, [O Muhammad], en jy sal nie vergeet nie,

trans-unit.source: Except what Allah should will. Indeed, He knows what is declared and what is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe wat Allah moet wil.

trans-unit.source: And We will ease you toward ease.
trans-unit.target: En ons sal jou gemak na gemak.

trans-unit.source: So remind, if the reminder should benefit;
trans-unit.target: So herinner, as die herinnering moet baat vind;

trans-unit.source: He who fears [Allah] will be reminded.
trans-unit.target: Hy wat vrees [Allah] sal herinner.

trans-unit.source: But the wretched one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Maar die ongelukkige een sal dit verhoed dat -

trans-unit.source: [He] who will [enter and] burn in the greatest Fire,
trans-unit.target: [Hy] wat [betree en] brand in die grootste vuur,

trans-unit.source: Neither dying therein nor living.
trans-unit.target: Nie daarin sterf of lewe.

trans-unit.source: He has certainly succeeded who purifies himself
trans-unit.target: Hy het beslis daarin geslaag wat homself reinig

trans-unit.source: And mentions the name of his Lord and prays.
trans-unit.target: En noem die naam van die Here en bid.

trans-unit.source: But you prefer the worldly life,
trans-unit.target: Maar jy verkies die aardse lewe,

trans-unit.source: While the Hereafter is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: Terwyl die Hiernamaals beter en meer blywende.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, this is in the former scriptures,
trans-unit.target: Dit is inderdaad in die voormalige Skrifte,

trans-unit.source: The scriptures of Abraham and Moses.
trans-unit.target: Die geskrifte van Abraham en Moses.

trans-unit.source: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
trans-unit.target: Het daar die verslag van die oorgrote [gebeurtenis] bereik jy?

trans-unit.source: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
trans-unit.target: [Sommige] gesigte op die Dag sal verneder word,

trans-unit.source: Working [hard] and exhausted.
trans-unit.target: Werk [hard] en uitgeput.

trans-unit.source: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal [betree om] brand in 'n intens warm vuur.

trans-unit.source: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
trans-unit.target: Hulle sal drink gegee uit 'n kokende lente.

trans-unit.source: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
trans-unit.target: Vir hulle sal daar geen kos behalwe van 'n giftige, netelige plant

trans-unit.source: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
trans-unit.target: Wat nie voed nie beskikbaarheid teen honger.

trans-unit.source: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [Ander] gesigte op die Dag sal plesier wys.

trans-unit.source: With their effort [they are] satisfied
trans-unit.target: Met hul poging [hulle] tevrede

trans-unit.source: In an elevated garden,
trans-unit.target: In 'n verhoogde tuin,

trans-unit.source: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
trans-unit.target: Waarin hulle sal nie ongeskik spraak hoor.

trans-unit.source: Within it is a flowing spring.
trans-unit.target: Binne is dit 'n vloeiende fontein.

trans-unit.source: Within it are couches raised high
trans-unit.target: Binne is dit is rusbanke omhoog

trans-unit.source: And cups put in place
trans-unit.target: En koppies in plek gestel

trans-unit.source: And cushions lined up
trans-unit.target: En kussings opgelyn

trans-unit.source: And carpets spread around.
trans-unit.target: En matte versprei oor.

trans-unit.source: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
trans-unit.target: Dan hoef hulle nie te kyk na die kamele - hoe dit geskep word?

trans-unit.source: And at the sky - how it is raised?
trans-unit.target: En op die lug - hoe daar word opgewek?

trans-unit.source: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
trans-unit.target: En op die berge - hoe hulle opgerig?

trans-unit.source: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
trans-unit.target: En op die aarde is - hoe dit versprei?

trans-unit.source: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
trans-unit.target: So herinner, [O Muhammad];

trans-unit.source: You are not over them a controller.
trans-unit.target: Jy is nie meer vir hulle 'n kontroleerder.

trans-unit.source: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
trans-unit.target: Maar hy wat afwyk en nie glo -

trans-unit.source: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
trans-unit.target: Dan sal Allah hom straf met die grootste straf.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to Us is their return.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, aan ons is hul terugkeer.

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
trans-unit.target: Dan inderdaad op ons is hul rekening.

trans-unit.source: By the dawn
trans-unit.target: Deur die dagbreek

trans-unit.source: And [by] ten nights
trans-unit.target: En [deur] tien nagte

trans-unit.source: And [by] the even [number] and the odd
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die aand [aantal] en die vreemde

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it passes,
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die nag wanneer dit verby is,

trans-unit.source: Is there [not] in [all] that an oath [sufficient] for one of perception?
trans-unit.target: Is daar [nie] in [al] wat 'n eed [voldoende] vir een van persepsie?

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered how your Lord dealt with 'Aad -
trans-unit.target: Het jy nie gesien hoe jou Here met 'Aad gehandel -

trans-unit.source: [With] Iram - who had lofty pillars,
trans-unit.target: [Met] Iram - wat verhewe pilare,

trans-unit.source: The likes of whom had never been created in the land?
trans-unit.target: Die hou van wie nog nooit geskep in die land?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Thamud, who carved out the rocks in the valley?
trans-unit.target: En [met] Samoed, wat uitgekap die rotse in die vallei?

trans-unit.source: And [with] Pharaoh, owner of the stakes? -
trans-unit.target: En [met] Farao, eienaar van die spel?

trans-unit.source: [All of] whom oppressed within the lands
trans-unit.target: [Al] wie onderdruk binne die lande

trans-unit.source: And increased therein the corruption.
trans-unit.target: En daarin het die korrupsie.

trans-unit.source: So your Lord poured upon them a scourge of punishment.
trans-unit.target: So jou Here uitgestort oor hulle het 'n sweep van straf.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your Lord is in observation.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, jou God is in waarneming.

trans-unit.source: And as for man, when his Lord tries him and [thus] is generous to him and favors him, he says, "My Lord has honored me."
trans-unit.target: En as vir die mens, wanneer die Here probeer hom en [dus] is ruim met hom en bevoordeel hom, sê hy: "My Here het my vereer."

trans-unit.source: But when He tries him and restricts his provision, he says, "My Lord has humiliated me."
trans-unit.target: Maar wanneer Hy probeer hom en beperk sy bepaling, sê hy: "My Here het my verneder."

trans-unit.source: No! But you do not honor the orphan
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And you do not encourage one another to feed the poor.
trans-unit.target: En jy hoef nie aan te moedig mekaar aan die armes te voed.

trans-unit.source: And you consume inheritance, devouring [it] altogether,
trans-unit.target: En jy verbruik erfenis, wat verslind [dit] geheel en al,

trans-unit.source: And you love wealth with immense love.
trans-unit.target: En jy is lief vir rykdom met groot liefde.

trans-unit.source: No! When the earth has been leveled - pounded and crushed -
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And your Lord has come and the angels, rank upon rank,
trans-unit.target: En jou Here het gekom en die engele in rye ingedeel,

trans-unit.source: And brought [within view], that Day, is Hell - that Day, man will remember, but what good to him will be the remembrance?
trans-unit.target: En gebring [binne siening], Dag, is die hel - die Dag man sal onthou, maar wat goed is in sy sal die gedagtenis wees?

trans-unit.source: He will say, "Oh, I wish I had sent ahead [some good] for my life."
trans-unit.target: Hy sal sê: "O, ek wens ek het vorentoe vir my lewe het [ 'n paar goeie]."

trans-unit.source: So on that Day, none will punish [as severely] as His punishment,
trans-unit.target: So op daardie dag, sal geen straf [as ernstig] as sy straf,

trans-unit.source: And none will bind [as severely] as His binding [of the evildoers].
trans-unit.target: En niemand sal bind [as ernstig] as sy bindende [van die kwaaddoeners].

trans-unit.source: [To the righteous it will be said], "O reassured soul,
trans-unit.target: [Om die regverdige sal dit gesê word], "O gerusgestel siel,

trans-unit.source: Return to your Lord, well-pleased and pleasing [to Him],
trans-unit.target: Gaan terug na jou Here, goed bly en aangenaam [Hom],

trans-unit.source: And enter among My [righteous] servants
trans-unit.target: En gaan onder My [regverdige] dienaars

trans-unit.source: And enter My Paradise."
trans-unit.target: En gaan my paradys. "

trans-unit.source: I swear by this city, Makkah -
trans-unit.target: Ek sweer by hierdie stad, Makkah -

trans-unit.source: And you, [O Muhammad], are free of restriction in this city -
trans-unit.target: En jy, [O Muhammad], is vry van beperkings in hierdie stad -

trans-unit.source: And [by] the father and that which was born [of him],
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die vader en wat gebore [hom],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man into hardship.
trans-unit.target: Ons het beslis het die mens geskape na swaarkry.

trans-unit.source: Does he think that never will anyone overcome him?
trans-unit.target: Dink hy dat nooit sal iemand hom oorkom?

trans-unit.source: He says, "I have spent wealth in abundance."
trans-unit.target: Hy sê, "Ek het rykdom bestee in oorvloed."

trans-unit.source: Does he think that no one has seen him?
trans-unit.target: Dink hy dat niemand hom gesien het?

trans-unit.source: Have We not made for him two eyes?
trans-unit.target: Ons het nie vir hom twee oë?

trans-unit.source: And a tongue and two lips?
trans-unit.target: En 'n tong en twee lippe?

trans-unit.source: And have shown him the two ways?
trans-unit.target: En het hom die twee maniere getoon?

trans-unit.source: But he has not broken through the difficult pass.
trans-unit.target: Maar hy het nie gebreek deur die moeilike slaag.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is [breaking through] the difficult pass?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat [deurbreek] die moeilike aangee?

trans-unit.source: It is the freeing of a slave
trans-unit.target: Dit is die vrylating van 'n slaaf

trans-unit.source: Or feeding on a day of severe hunger
trans-unit.target: Of voer op 'n dag van erge honger

trans-unit.source: An orphan of near relationship
trans-unit.target: 'N weeskind van naby verhouding

trans-unit.source: Or a needy person in misery
trans-unit.target: Of 'n behoeftige persoon in ellende

trans-unit.source: And then being among those who believed and advised one another to patience and advised one another to compassion.
trans-unit.target: En dan word onder diegene wat geglo en aangeraai mekaar te geduld en aangeraai mekaar te ontferm.

trans-unit.source: Those are the companions of the right.
trans-unit.target: Dit is die bewoners van die reg.

trans-unit.source: But they who disbelieved in Our signs - those are the companions of the left.
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle wat in Ons tekens geglo - dit is die bewoners van die linkerkant.

trans-unit.source: Over them will be fire closed in.
trans-unit.target: Oor hulle sal brand in gesluit.

trans-unit.source: By the sun and its brightness
trans-unit.target: Deur die son en sy glans

trans-unit.source: And [by] the moon when it follows it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die maan wanneer dit volg dit

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it displays it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die dag wanneer dit vertoon dit

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die nag wanneer dit dek dit

trans-unit.source: And [by] the sky and He who constructed it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die hemel en Hy wat dit gebou

trans-unit.source: And [by] the earth and He who spread it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die aarde en Hy wat versprei dit

trans-unit.source: And [by] the soul and He who proportioned it
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die siel en Hy wat dit in verhouding

trans-unit.source: And inspired it [with discernment of] its wickedness and its righteousness,
trans-unit.target: En geïnspireer dit [met onderskeiding van] sy goddeloosheid en van sy geregtigheid,

trans-unit.source: He has succeeded who purifies it,
trans-unit.target: Hy het daarin geslaag om wie dit reinig,

trans-unit.source: And he has failed who instills it [with corruption].
trans-unit.target: En hy in gebreke gebly het wat dit vestig [korrupsie].

trans-unit.source: Thamud denied [their prophet] by reason of their transgression,
trans-unit.target: Samoed geweier [hul profeet] as gevolg van hulle oortreding

trans-unit.source: When the most wretched of them was sent forth.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die ellendigste van hulle is wat uitgestuur is.

trans-unit.source: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
trans-unit.target: Toe sê die boodskapper van Allah [Salih] sê vir hulle: "[Moenie benadeel] die kamelin van Allah of [haar verhoed] sy drink."

trans-unit.source: But they denied him and hamstrung her. So their Lord brought down upon them destruction for their sin and made it equal [upon all of them].
trans-unit.target: Maar hulle het Hom verloën en gekortwiek haar.

trans-unit.source: And He does not fear the consequence thereof.
trans-unit.target: En Hy het nie die gevolg daarvan vrees.

trans-unit.source: By the night when it covers
trans-unit.target: Deur die nag wanneer dit dek

trans-unit.source: And [by] the day when it appears
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die dag toe dit blyk

trans-unit.source: And [by] He who created the male and female,
trans-unit.target: En [deur] Wie die man en vrou het,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your efforts are diverse.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, jou pogings is baie uiteenlopend.

trans-unit.source: As for he who gives and fears Allah
trans-unit.target: Soos vir wie gee en vrees Allah

trans-unit.source: And believes in the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: En glo in die beste [beloning],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward ease.
trans-unit.target: Ons sal hom verlig in die rigting van gemak.

trans-unit.source: But as for he who withholds and considers himself free of need
trans-unit.target: Maar wat hy teëhouer en beskou homself vry van nood

trans-unit.source: And denies the best [reward],
trans-unit.target: En ontken die beste [beloning],

trans-unit.source: We will ease him toward difficulty.
trans-unit.target: Ons sal hom verlig in die rigting van moeilikheidsgraad.

trans-unit.source: And what will his wealth avail him when he falls?
trans-unit.target: En wat sal sy rykdom maak hom toe hy val?

trans-unit.source: Indeed, [incumbent] upon Us is guidance.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, [plig] oor ons leiding.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, to Us belongs the Hereafter and the first [life].
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, aan ons kom toe die Hiernamaals en die eerste [lewe].

trans-unit.source: So I have warned you of a Fire which is blazing.
trans-unit.target: So het Ek julle gewaarsku van 'n brand wat brandende.

trans-unit.source: None will [enter to] burn therein except the most wretched one.
trans-unit.target: Geen sal [betree om] daarin verbrand nie, behalwe die mees ongelukkige een.

trans-unit.source: Who had denied and turned away.
trans-unit.target: Wie het geweier en draai weg.

trans-unit.source: But the righteous one will avoid it -
trans-unit.target: Maar die regverdige sal dit verhoed dat -

trans-unit.source: [He] who gives [from] his wealth to purify himself
trans-unit.target: [Hy] wat gee [uit] sy rykdom vir homself te reinig

trans-unit.source: And not [giving] for anyone who has [done him] a favor to be rewarded
trans-unit.target: En nie [gee] vir enigiemand wat [gedoen hom] 'n guns te beloon word

trans-unit.source: But only seeking the countenance of his Lord, Most High.
trans-unit.target: Maar net op soek na die aangesig van die Here, die Allerhoogste.

trans-unit.source: And he is going to be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: En hy gaan tevrede wees.

trans-unit.source: By the morning brightness
trans-unit.target: Deur die glans oggend

trans-unit.source: And [by] the night when it covers with darkness,
trans-unit.target: En [deur] die nag wanneer dit dek met duisternis,

trans-unit.source: Your Lord has not taken leave of you, [O Muhammad], nor has He detested [you].
trans-unit.target: Jou Here het nie geneem verlof van julle [O Muhammad], of het Hy gehaat [jy].

trans-unit.source: And the Hereafter is better for you than the first [life].
trans-unit.target: En in die Hiernamaals is beter vir jou as die eerste [lewe].

trans-unit.source: And your Lord is going to give you, and you will be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: En jou Here gaan jou gee, en jy sal tevrede wees.

trans-unit.source: Did He not find you an orphan and give [you] refuge?
trans-unit.target: Het Hy nie vind jy 'n weeskind en gee [jy] toevlug?

trans-unit.source: And He found you lost and guided [you],
trans-unit.target: En Hy het jou verloor en gelei [jy],

trans-unit.source: And He found you poor and made [you] self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: En Hy het jou arm en het [jy] selfonderhoudend.

trans-unit.source: So as for the orphan, do not oppress [him].
trans-unit.target: So as vir die weeskind, nie verdruk [hom].

trans-unit.source: And as for the petitioner, do not repel [him].
trans-unit.target: En wat betref die ster, moenie stoot [hom].

trans-unit.source: But as for the favor of your Lord, report [it].
trans-unit.target: Maar oor die guns van jou Here, rapporteer [dit].

trans-unit.source: Did We not expand for you, [O Muhammad], your breast?
trans-unit.target: Het ons nie uit te brei vir jou, [O Muhammad], jou bors?

trans-unit.source: And We removed from you your burden
trans-unit.target: En ons verwyder van jou las

trans-unit.source: Which had weighed upon your back
trans-unit.target: Wat het geweeg op jou rug

trans-unit.source: And raised high for you your repute.
trans-unit.target: En wat 'n hoë vir jou reputasie.

trans-unit.source: For indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Want, met swaarkry [sal] verlig.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, with hardship [will be] ease.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, met swaarkry [sal] verlig.

trans-unit.source: So when you have finished [your duties], then stand up [for worship].
trans-unit.target: So wanneer jy klaar is met [jou pligte], dan opstaan [vir aanbidding].

trans-unit.source: And to your Lord direct [your] longing.
trans-unit.target: En om jou Here rig [jou] verlange.

trans-unit.source: By the fig and the olive
trans-unit.target: Deur die vyeboom en die olyf

trans-unit.source: And [by] Mount Sinai
trans-unit.target: En [deur] Sinaiberg

trans-unit.source: And [by] this secure city [Makkah],
trans-unit.target: En [deur] veilige stad [Makkah],

trans-unit.source: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
trans-unit.target: Ons het beslis die mens geskape na die beste van hoë gestalte nie,

trans-unit.source: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
trans-unit.target: Toe Ons bring hom terug by die laagste van die lae,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe vir diegene wat glo en goeie werke doen, want hulle sal 'n beloning ononderbroke het.

trans-unit.source: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: So, wat nog jy veroorsaak uitgesien na die beloning ontken?

trans-unit.source: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
trans-unit.target: Is dit nie Allah die meeste net van beoordelaars?

trans-unit.source: Recite in the name of your Lord who created -
trans-unit.target: Sê in die naam van jou Here wat geskep -

trans-unit.source: Created man from a clinging substance.
trans-unit.target: Het die mens geskape uit 'n vasklou stof.

trans-unit.source: Recite, and your Lord is the most Generous -
trans-unit.target: Sê, en jou God is die mees vrygewige -

trans-unit.source: Who taught by the pen -
trans-unit.target: Wie geleer deur die pen -

trans-unit.source: Taught man that which he knew not.
trans-unit.target: Geleer man wat hy nie geweet het nie.

trans-unit.source: No! [But] indeed, man transgresses
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Because he sees himself self-sufficient.
trans-unit.target: Omdat hy homself sien selfonderhoudend.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, to your Lord is the return.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, om jou Here is die terugkeer.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who forbids
trans-unit.target: Het jy al die een wat verbied gesien

trans-unit.source: A servant when he prays?
trans-unit.target: N slaaf as hy bid?

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he is upon guidance
trans-unit.target: Het jy al gesien as hy op leiding

trans-unit.source: Or enjoins righteousness?
trans-unit.target: Of vir geregtigheid maant

trans-unit.source: Have you seen if he denies and turns away -
trans-unit.target: Het jy al gesien as hy ontken en draai weg -

trans-unit.source: Does he not know that Allah sees?
trans-unit.target: Is hy nie weet dat Allah sien?

trans-unit.source: No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock -
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: A lying, sinning forelock.
trans-unit.target: 'N leuen, sondig kuif.

trans-unit.source: Then let him call his associates;
trans-unit.target: Dan moet hom bel sy medewerkers;

trans-unit.source: We will call the angels of Hell.
trans-unit.target: Ons sal die engele van die hel noem.

trans-unit.source: No! Do not obey him. But prostrate and draw near [to Allah].
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, ons het die Koran af gedurende die nag van Besluit.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die nag van Besluit?

trans-unit.source: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
trans-unit.target: Die Nag van Besluit is beter as 'n duisend maande.

trans-unit.source: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
trans-unit.target: Die engele en die Gees daarin neerdaal met toestemming van hul Here vir elke saak.

trans-unit.source: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
trans-unit.target: Vrede is dit tot die opkoms van dagbreek.

trans-unit.source: Those who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists were not to be parted [from misbelief] until there came to them clear evidence -
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat onder die mense van die Boek en die afgode dienaars nie geglo het nie [van heersende misvatting] word verdeel totdat daar vir hulle 'n duidelike bewys het -

trans-unit.source: A Messenger from Allah, reciting purified scriptures
trans-unit.target: 'N boodskapper van Allah, die voordrag gesuiwerde geskrifte

trans-unit.source: Within which are correct writings.
trans-unit.target: Waarbinne korrek geskrifte.

trans-unit.source: Nor did those who were given the Scripture become divided until after there had come to them clear evidence.
trans-unit.target: Ook het diegene wat die Skrif word verdeel gegee tot ná daar om hulle te kom 'n duidelike bewys.

trans-unit.source: And they were not commanded except to worship Allah, [being] sincere to Him in religion, inclining to truth, and to establish prayer and to give zakah. And that is the correct religion.
trans-unit.target: En hulle was nie beveel behalwe Allah, [wat] opregte Hom in geloof, neig om die waarheid, te aanbid en gebed te vestig en om Zakah gee.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who disbelieved among the People of the Scripture and the polytheists will be in the fire of Hell, abiding eternally therein. Those are the worst of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal hulle wat onder die mense van die Boek en die afgode dienaars nie geglo in die vuur van die hel, as iets blywends ewig daarin.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, they who have believed and done righteous deeds - those are the best of creatures.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, hulle wat gelowig geword en gedoen regverdige dade - dit is die beste van die skepping.

trans-unit.source: Their reward with Allah will be gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they will abide forever, Allah being pleased with them and they with Him. That is for whoever has feared his Lord.
trans-unit.target: Hul beloning by Allah sal tuine van ewige woning waardeur riviere strome, waarin hulle vir ewig sal bly, Allah om tevrede met hulle en hulle met hom.

trans-unit.source: When the earth is shaken with its [final] earthquake
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die aarde geskud met sy [finale] aardbewing

trans-unit.source: And the earth discharges its burdens
trans-unit.target: En die aarde afskiet sy laste

trans-unit.source: And man says, "What is [wrong] with it?" -
trans-unit.target: En die mens sê, "Wat is [verkeerd] daarmee?"

trans-unit.source: That Day, it will report its news
trans-unit.target: Daardie dag sal dit sy nuusberig

trans-unit.source: Because your Lord has commanded it.
trans-unit.target: Omdat jou Here het dit beveel.

trans-unit.source: That Day, the people will depart separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
trans-unit.target: Dié dag sal die mense wyk geskei [in kategorieë] om te sien wees [die gevolg van] hul dade.

trans-unit.source: So whoever does an atom's weight of good will see it,
trans-unit.target: So elkeen wat 'n atoom se gewig van goeie sal dit sien,

trans-unit.source: And whoever does an atom's weight of evil will see it.
trans-unit.target: En elkeen wat dit doen 'n atoom se gewig van die bose sal dit sien.

trans-unit.source: By the racers, panting,
trans-unit.target: Deur die jaers, hyg,

trans-unit.source: And the producers of sparks [when] striking
trans-unit.target: En die produsente van vonke [wanneer] treffende

trans-unit.source: And the chargers at dawn,
trans-unit.target: En die aanvallers teen dagbreek,

trans-unit.source: Stirring up thereby [clouds of] dust,
trans-unit.target: Verwek sodoende [wolke van] stof,

trans-unit.source: Arriving thereby in the center collectively,
trans-unit.target: Aankom en daardeur in die sentrum gesamentlik,

trans-unit.source: Indeed mankind, to his Lord, is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad die mensdom, sy Here, is ondankbaar.

trans-unit.source: And indeed, he is to that a witness.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad, hy is daarby 'n getuie.

trans-unit.source: And indeed he is, in love of wealth, intense.
trans-unit.target: En inderdaad is hy, in die liefde van rykdom, intens.

trans-unit.source: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
trans-unit.target: Maar hy weet nie dat wanneer die inhoud van die grafte gestrooi

trans-unit.source: And that within the breasts is obtained,
trans-unit.target: En dit binne die borste verkry,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, their Lord with them, that Day, is [fully] Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, hulle Here met hulle op die Dag is [ten volle] vertroud.

trans-unit.source: The Striking Calamity -
trans-unit.target: Die treffende ONGELUK -

trans-unit.source: What is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: Wat is die opvallende ONGELUK?

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die opvallende ONGELUK?

trans-unit.source: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,
trans-unit.target: Dit is die dag wanneer mense sal wees soos motte, versprei,

trans-unit.source: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.
trans-unit.target: En die berge sal word soos wol, fluffed up.

trans-unit.source: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
trans-unit.target: Dan as vir een wie se skale is swaar [met goeie dade],

trans-unit.source: He will be in a pleasant life.
trans-unit.target: Hy sal in 'n aangename lewe.

trans-unit.source: But as for one whose scales are light,
trans-unit.target: Maar soos die kind wie se skale is lig,

trans-unit.source: His refuge will be an abyss.
trans-unit.target: Sy toevlug sal 'n afgrond wees.

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what that is?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat dit is?

trans-unit.source: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
trans-unit.target: Dit is 'n vuur, intens warm.

trans-unit.source: Competition in [worldly] increase diverts you
trans-unit.target: Mededinging in [wêreldse] toename verlegt jy

trans-unit.source: Until you visit the graveyards.
trans-unit.target: Totdat jy besoek die begraafplase.

trans-unit.source: No! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: Then no! You are going to know.
trans-unit.target: NEE,!

trans-unit.source: No! If you only knew with knowledge of certainty...
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: You will surely see the Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: Jy sal sekerlik sien die Hellfire.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely see it with the eye of certainty.
trans-unit.target: Dan sal jy sekerlik sien dit met die oog van sekerheid.

trans-unit.source: Then you will surely be asked that Day about pleasure.
trans-unit.target: Dan sal jy sekerlik gevra op dié dag omtrent plesier.

trans-unit.source: By time,
trans-unit.target: Deur tyd,

trans-unit.source: Indeed, mankind is in loss,
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, die mensdom is in die verlies,

trans-unit.source: Except for those who have believed and done righteous deeds and advised each other to truth and advised each other to patience.
trans-unit.target: Behalwe vir diegene wat geglo het en gedoen regverdige dade en aangeraai mekaar te trou en aangeraai mekaar te geduld.

trans-unit.source: Woe to every scorner and mocker
trans-unit.target: Wee elke spotter en spotter

trans-unit.source: Who collects wealth and [continuously] counts it.
trans-unit.target: Wie versamel rykdom en [voortdurend] tel nie.

trans-unit.source: He thinks that his wealth will make him immortal.
trans-unit.target: Hy dink dat sy rykdom hom onsterflik sal maak.

trans-unit.source: No! He will surely be thrown into the Crusher.
trans-unit.target: Geen!

trans-unit.source: And what can make you know what is the Crusher?
trans-unit.target: En wat kan maak dat jy weet wat is die breker?

trans-unit.source: It is the fire of Allah, [eternally] fueled,
trans-unit.target: Dit is die vuur van Allah, [ewig] aangevuur,

trans-unit.source: Which mounts directed at the hearts.
trans-unit.target: Watter mounts wat gerig is op die harte.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Hellfire will be closed down upon them
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, sal Hellfire af gesluit wees op hulle

trans-unit.source: In extended columns.
trans-unit.target: In uitgebreide kolomme.

trans-unit.source: Have you not considered, [O Muhammad], how your Lord dealt with the companions of the elephant?
trans-unit.target: Het jy nie beskou, [O Muhammad], hoe jou Here met die bewoners van die olifant?

trans-unit.source: Did He not make their plan into misguidance?
trans-unit.target: Het Hy nie hul plan in misleiding te maak?

trans-unit.source: And He sent against them birds in flocks,
trans-unit.target: En Hy het teen hulle voëls in swerms,

trans-unit.source: Striking them with stones of hard clay,
trans-unit.target: Opvallend hulle met klippe van harde klei,

trans-unit.source: And He made them like eaten straw.
trans-unit.target: En Hy het hulle soos geëet strooi.

trans-unit.source: For the accustomed security of the Quraysh -
trans-unit.target: Vir die gewoond sekuriteit van die Quraysh -

trans-unit.source: Their accustomed security [in] the caravan of winter and summer -
trans-unit.target: Hul gewoond sekuriteit [in] die karavaan van die winter en somer -

trans-unit.source: Let them worship the Lord of this House,
trans-unit.target: Laat hulle die Here van die Huis aanbid,

trans-unit.source: Who has fed them, [saving them] from hunger and made them safe, [saving them] from fear.
trans-unit.target: Wie het hulle gevoed, [hulle spaar] van honger en het hulle veilig is, [dit spaar] uit vrees.

trans-unit.source: Have you seen the one who denies the Recompense?
trans-unit.target: Het jy al die een wat die beloning ontken gesien?

trans-unit.source: For that is the one who drives away the orphan
trans-unit.target: Want dit is die een wat weg dryf die weeskind

trans-unit.source: And does not encourage the feeding of the poor.
trans-unit.target: En nie die voeding van die armes aan te moedig.

trans-unit.source: So woe to those who pray
trans-unit.target: So wee die vroue wat bid

trans-unit.source: [But] who are heedless of their prayer -
trans-unit.target: [Maar] wat agt mense van hulle gebed -

trans-unit.source: Those who make show [of their deeds]
trans-unit.target: Diegene wat show te maak [van hul werke]

trans-unit.source: And withhold [simple] assistance.
trans-unit.target: En weerhou [eenvoudige] bystand.

trans-unit.source: Indeed, We have granted you, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, het ons jou toegestaan word, [O Muhammad], al-Kawthar.

trans-unit.source: So pray to your Lord and sacrifice [to Him alone].
trans-unit.target: So bid tot die Here en die offer [Hom alleen].

trans-unit.source: Indeed, your enemy is the one cut off.
trans-unit.target: Inderdaad, jou vyand is die een afgesny.

trans-unit.source: Say, "O disbelievers,
trans-unit.target: Sê, "O ongelowiges,

trans-unit.source: I do not worship what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ek weet nie aanbid wat jy aanbid.

trans-unit.source: Nor are you worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Of is jy aanbidders van wat ek aanbid.

trans-unit.source: Nor will I be a worshipper of what you worship.
trans-unit.target: Ook sal Ek 'n aanbidder van wat jy aanbid.

trans-unit.source: Nor will you be worshippers of what I worship.
trans-unit.target: Ook sal jy wees aanbidders van wat ek aanbid.

trans-unit.source: For you is your religion, and for me is my religion."
trans-unit.target: Vir jou is jou godsdiens, en vir my is my godsdiens. "

trans-unit.source: When the victory of Allah has come and the conquest,
trans-unit.target: Wanneer die oorwinning van Allah het gekom en die verowering,

trans-unit.source: And you see the people entering into the religion of Allah in multitudes,
trans-unit.target: En jy sien die mense aangaan van die godsdiens van Allah in menigte,

trans-unit.source: Then exalt [Him] with praise of your Lord and ask forgiveness of Him. Indeed, He is ever Accepting of repentance.
trans-unit.target: verhef dan [hom] met lof van jou Here en vra vergifnis van Hom.

trans-unit.source: May the hands of Abu Lahab be ruined, and ruined is he.
trans-unit.target: Mag die hande van Abu Lahab verwoes, en verwoes is hy.

trans-unit.source: His wealth will not avail him or that which he gained.
trans-unit.target: Sy rykdom sal hom of wat hy opgedoen het nie gebruik maak.

trans-unit.source: He will [enter to] burn in a Fire of [blazing] flame
trans-unit.target: Hy sal [betree om] brand in 'n vuur van [gedugte] vlam

trans-unit.source: And his wife [as well] - the carrier of firewood.
trans-unit.target: En sy vrou [sowel] - die draer van vuurmaakhout.

trans-unit.source: Around her neck is a rope of [twisted] fiber.
trans-unit.target: Om haar nek is 'n tou van [gedraai] vesel.

trans-unit.source: Say, "He is Allah, [who is] One,
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Hy is Allah, [wat] Een,

trans-unit.source: Allah, the Eternal Refuge.
trans-unit.target: Allah, die ewige toevlug.

trans-unit.source: He neither begets nor is born,
trans-unit.target: Hy nie wek nie gebore word nie,

trans-unit.source: Nor is there to Him any equivalent."
trans-unit.target: Ook is daar om hom enige ekwivalent. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of daybreak
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Ek soek skuiling in die Here van dagbreek

trans-unit.source: From the evil of that which He created
trans-unit.target: Van die bose van wat Hy geskep

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of darkness when it settles
trans-unit.target: En van die boosheid van die duisternis wanneer dit gaan lê

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of the blowers in knots
trans-unit.target: En van die boosheid van die blasers in knope

trans-unit.source: And from the evil of an envier when he envies."
trans-unit.target: En van die boosheid van 'n benijder toe hy beny. "

trans-unit.source: Say, "I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Sê: "Ek soek skuiling in die Here van die mensdom,

trans-unit.source: The Sovereign of mankind.
trans-unit.target: Die Here van die mensdom.

trans-unit.source: The God of mankind,
trans-unit.target: Die God van die mensdom,

trans-unit.source: From the evil of the retreating whisperer -
trans-unit.target: Van die kwaad van die aftog blaas kwaadstoker -

trans-unit.source: Who whispers [evil] into the breasts of mankind -
trans-unit.target: Wie fluister [bose] in die borste van die mensdom -

trans-unit.source: From among the jinn and mankind."
trans-unit.target: Van onder die djinn en die mensdom. "
